programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a vintage stopwatch in the garage which lets you wind back the minute that has just passed by and it can even stop time and movement in ones surroundings. This will give him a sure advantage over the Lemmings, provided of course they dont get their hands on it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is disturbed in the middle of his TV snack by a strange flow of incongruous objects that have been transformed into hot-air balloons. When he sees the Lemmings onboard these curious zeppelins, Grizzy understands that he will quickly have to confiscate their helium tank and balloons if he wants to relax in front of the TV.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers with great delight that the ranger has purchased a brand new multifunction Stressless recliner. But even an armchair designed for well-being - the ultimate in relaxation - can used for other purposes by the Lemmings, who transform it into a fearsome multi-game chair.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
programme.desc: Scooby-Doo takes the gang to meet his good friend, Lucy Liu, at her art gallery in Queens. She has a large art studio above the gallery that she uses to paint and sculpt. Shes having a big gallery opening, but when one of her large humanoid modern sculptures comes alive and attacks them, the gang and Lucy have a real mystery on their hands. It seems the monster is very interested in an old seemingly-worthless piece of wood Ms. Liu collected when she was a girl right here in Queens. It turns out that its actually a puzzle-box and what it contains opens up a whole new layer to this mystery. Can our gang help Lucy Liu save her gallery opening and trap the monster? Or will they all be painted into a corner, permanently!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Every time Mush-Mush has tried to surprise his friend with a gift, Chep has always found out what it was. But Chep promises that this time he won’t.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mushpie loves to sing. Only problem she is terrible at it! But Lilit, who has never heard her sing before, wants to make Mushpie happy and organizes a concert for her to sing in front of all the other Mushables... who are terrified at the idea! But Lilit doesnt have the heart to admit this to Mushpie.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mushpot wishes he could roll back the seasons and relive being a Mushler, our friends get him to hang out doing cool Mushler stuff. But this just shows that Mushpot is no longer able to do all those things. Sigh! However, when our friends find a map that points to a treasure he buried when he was a Mushler, Mushpot realises its just the Mushler experience he needed.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush cant figure out why his sense foot keeps buzzing like crazy... until an earthquake shakes the forest. Mush-Mush is sure he predicted it! Convinced he can now predict the future, Mush-Mush starts making predictions for everyone in Mushton...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: MMs favourite frog has had its home taken over by a lizard. Mushpot says not to interfere - nature must run its course. But Lilit feels so sorry for the frog she takes it back to Mushton where it causes havoc. Now our friends must lure the frog back to its home where it deals with the lizard itself.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Its Fool the Forest Day! Mushables pull pranks all over Mushton, and Mush-Mush has an epic one planned. But our Mushlers spill Chanterelles paint by accident, and now they must replace it by finding a rare Sloof beetle they have never heard of….

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When ants invade Fung and Miffs tree, our Mushlers offer for them to move in... but the two quickly turn out to be unbearable roommates. So when Fung and Miff break their trampoline, our friends decide its time for them to go back to their homes. But first they need to get rid of the ants...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and his friends are determined to win the bark sledge race, but their essential fourth team member drops out. Our friends ask Mushpot to step up from being their coach to racing with them. The Mushelder is reluctant at first but soon reveals the tough competitor he is!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Truff is happy. He has found a necklace that makes him even Truffier! Except he had no idea the necklace belongs to Starmush. And the Mushelder promised there will be consequences for whoever took it. Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit now have to save Truff from being consequenced...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit is under pressure. Truff, the most talented musician in Mushton, has invited her, Mush-Mush and Chep to form a band with him. Only problem is they can hardly play music! Truff insists: they just need to relax and feel the groove. But when Truff tells his new band they will perform at the Food Snail, Lilit isn’t relaxed at all!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Because he has won the moss-ball game last year, Puff is in charge of organizing this Summer’s Picnic. Only Puff isn’t comfortable in that role. Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit offer to help and make sure all the Mushables will follow Puff’s lead. Gradually, Puff gains confidence and ends up bossing everyone around. Now, all the Mushables are about to flee the Picnic!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit notice that Mushpie seems in great shape lately. They want to feel as great as she does and try to discover her secret.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Lilit creates a "friends tree" mapping out who everyone is best friends with in Mushton, she realizes Muddler has no friends at all. Unable to accept this, Lilit slips away to try and befriend him. But Muddlers perception of friendship is somewhat unique, meaning Lilit now needs the help of her two best friends, Mush-Mush and Chep, to escape from Muddlers clutches.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Having rescued a Mushlet, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit becomes heroes in Mushton, and theyre loving it! So Mushlers create a rescue team - but, alas, no one needs saving! How can you be a hero when there is nothing to be heroic about?!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Beacon Mushroom that guides the Mushables back to Mushton in the dark has gone out. So Lilit lights up and stands in its place for the night... and soon gets quite bored! Lilits good deed has her regretting her gift - shes basically just a lamp! But when her light goes out, Lilit instantly regrets regretting it: she wants her gift back!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Every time Mush-Mush has tried to surprise his friend with a gift, Chep has always found out what it was. But Chep promises that this time he won’t.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mushpie loves to sing. Only problem she is terrible at it! But Lilit, who has never heard her sing before, wants to make Mushpie happy and organizes a concert for her to sing in front of all the other Mushables... who are terrified at the idea! But Lilit doesnt have the heart to admit this to Mushpie.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mushpot wishes he could roll back the seasons and relive being a Mushler, our friends get him to hang out doing cool Mushler stuff. But this just shows that Mushpot is no longer able to do all those things. Sigh! However, when our friends find a map that points to a treasure he buried when he was a Mushler, Mushpot realises its just the Mushler experience he needed.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is persuaded that the she-bear hes in love with has been turned into a frog. Whilst he looks through the rangers books of fairytales the Lemmings try to recover the frog.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers a baby raccoon not far from the log cabin. When he sees its big, moist eyes, Grizzy melts and adopts the creature. When the Lemmings drag the baby into their dangerous games, the overprotective Grizzy steps in, provoking even more perilous situations!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: By pure chance, Grizzy discovers the pleasures of video games on the rangers console. The Lemmings want to try their hand at the joystick but Grizzy refuses to interrupt his Kart racing game. They try everything, including temptation, to get him away from the console but theres nothing doing, Grizzy is addicted.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy builds a look-alike robot to keep the Lemmings away while he prepares a party for his beloved she-bear. But his doubles artificial intelligence leaves a lot to be desired.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When she is accidentally hit over the head, the she-bear Grizzy¿s in love thinks she¿s a Lemming. Grizzy thinks that another little well-placed bang over the head will knock her ideas back into place. The only problem is that the Lemmings, who are delighted to have a new playmate, have no intention of letting him proceed with his plan.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When a meteorite falls not far from the log cabin, strange berries start to grow. One of their properties is that they make anyone who eats them grow to disproportionate sizes.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Under the wood floor of the log cabin, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the entrance to an underground gallery with an old treasure card that indicates the location of a treasure. Upon closer look, the representation of this treasure greatly resembles a giant jar of chocolate spread.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.sub-title: In the Service of His Majesty
programme.desc: When he brandishes a native american scepter that the Lemmings brought home with other antique objects, Grizzy sees the Lemmings bow low before him and behave like servants. One of them has escaped the spell, but he will have to confront both Grizzy and his fellow creatures in order to recover the scepter and reverse the spell.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy tries to impress the she-bear that hes in love with by making a sculpture of her from a piece of wood. But as soon as the artists back is turned, the Lemmings gnaw at the work of art in order to transform it into a toboggan slide. Grizzy must succeed in getting rid of the Lemmings without his model realizing whats going on. An Art in itself!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Everyone in Mushton is finding that their precious wooden things are being munched and destroyed by someone or something.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: If Mush-Mush had Bolly’s speed, he’d want everyone to see just how awesomely fast he was. But Bolly is different – he just likes to use his speed helping Mushables. So when Mush-Mush organizes a big stunt for Bolly, he refuses. He just doesn’t like to show off. But Mush-Mush promised everyone a show so a show he will give them – with Mush-Mush performing instead of Bolly! Gulp!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep becomes obsessed with learning all about Mushlore – all the funny little traditions and things that Mushables believe in.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Starmushs back is stuck, and the Mushelder has no choice but to ask for help in Mushton. Because Chep is the one that finds a solution to his back problem, Starmush chooses him to help with his daily activities. But Mush-Mush is jealous, he would have loved being the chosen one...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is so good at moss-marbles, no one wants to play him anymore! No one except Sumush who reveals himself to be a tough competitor. To Chep’s disbelief, Sumush keeps on winning. But Lilit and Mush-Mush convince their friend not to give up. Chep decides to play his favourite moss-marble: the Rollinator. The one marble he never risked playing before...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is disappointed Mush-Mush and Lilit are too busy leaf-gliding to play moss-ball with him, so he hangs out with a new weevil friend instead. But Cheps new friend must migrate with all the other weevils -Except he doesnt know how to fly! Chep must teach him to fly while overcoming his own secret fear of heights.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When an egg blows down into the village, it is Mush-Mush and friends mission to return it to Mush Mountain. Two problems though: there is a Beetle Boom on and all the beetles try to charge and knock over Mushables, and Lilit has always wanted to see an egg hatch so secretly drags her feet...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Fung and Miff spoil Mush-Mushs fun tunnel surprise he has been working on for ages, he wishes their day was ruined too. And then it is, because they are taken by Muddler! Now our Mushlers have to go on a rescue mission to save Fung and Miff.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and friends "favourite play tree" the Fun Tree - is rotten and doomed. But Mush-Mush refuses to give up on it. In a last ditch effort to save the tree, our friends adventure off to try and track down the legendary Starmush, hoping his mysterious healing powers can save it.

programme.title: Moley
programme.desc: When a cell phone falls into Roley Poley park from the Great Above, the entire town is mesmerized by it and Moley must break the “spell” it has on them.

programme.title: Moley
programme.desc: When Moley gets in over his head when he enters a spicy chile eating contest, Manny accidentally makes the chile come alive!

programme.title: Moley
programme.desc: When Moley is given the key to the city, he has such a great day he convinces Manny to let him repeat the whole day! But when the day never stops repeating, Moley needs to find a way out.

programme.title: Moley
programme.desc: Moley is a lively animated comedy series for children and families of all ages. It follows the underground adventures of a charmingly optimistic young mole, Moley.

programme.title: Moley
programme.desc: Moley is a lively animated comedy series for children and families of all ages. It follows the underground adventures of a charmingly optimistic young mole, Moley.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean discovers Declan giving Irma a lift in his swanky new SUV. Bean is unimpressed until Declan shows off all the cars features. Undeterred, Bean professes his car superior. Declan issues a challenge -to see which car Irma will choose for her lift back to work. Bean decides his car may need a little pimping ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wickets Nephew is staying with her when he wins two tickets to an Outward Boundcourse. She refuses to go, but then ropes in Bean to look after the child. The two start a competition to see who will win the trophy. Bean is a relentless competitor, winning everything up until the point things start getting out of hand ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys a new Big Ted – but how will he get on with Teddy? / Mr Bean takes Billy to a climbing centre and gets drawn into a challenge.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean takes Billy to a climbing centre and gets drawn into a challenge. / Mr Bean decides to stay in bed all day – even when making his breakfast, brushing his teeth and ordering a pizza!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After seeing the flashy electric go-kart Mr Paliwal has bought for his daughter Divya, Mr Bean and Billy build their own using items around Mrs Wicket’s garden. At the go-kart track, Mr Bean and Mr Paliwal are unimpressed with Billy and Divya’s driving skills so take the karts for a “proper” race around the park. Meanwhile Mrs Wicket is on the warpath when she finds things missing from her house.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy have no plans, so decide to stay in bed all day. Mr Bean is determined that his feet can’t touch the ground, so he pushes the bed around with a broom. He has to find ingenious ways to make his tea and toast for breakfast, brush his teeth and an even bigger challenge of ordering a pizza and collecting it from downstairs without getting out of bed!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean uses Mr Paliwal’s new drone to help find his stolen car. / Mr Bean tricks Irma into a photoshoot just so he can submit a picture for a competition prize.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy are enjoying a day at the arcade, when Mr Bean gets carried away with the dance machine, knocking Teddy onto the floor. Teddy’s picked up, put on a trolley of stuffed toys and figurines – and soon enough, he’s been put in the claw machine as a prize! Mr Bean has run out of coins, so has to find a way of winning Teddy back without looking like he’s cheating!

programme.title: Kook mee met MAX
programme.desc: Wat eten we vanavond? Topkoks Sandra Ysbrandy en Mounir Toub geven antwoord op die ene moeilijke vraag. Ze bereiden makkelijke en verrassende gerechten.

programme.title: NOS Journaal
programme.desc: Met het laatste nieuws, gebeurtenissen van nationaal en internationaal belang en de weersverwachting.

programme.title: BinnensteBuiten
programme.desc: In Almere Oosterwold hebben Mara en Pim hun eigen duurzame huis ontworpen: licht, ruim en omringd door een grote tuin. Hun inrichting is een mix van tweedehands vondsten en familiestukken. * Op de paarsgekleurde heide van Doorwerth helpt Alain Caron mee de 300 schapen van Clemens en Marjel te hoeden. Zo houden zij de biodiversiteit van het gebied in stand. Alain verrast ze met een lekker gerecht. * In Oudewater werkt ecoloog Peter met passie aan het behoud van de Nederlandse natuur. Uit het hele land verzamelt hij inheemse wilde bloemenzaden, die weer worden gebruikt voor diverse inzaaiprojecten als bermen, dijken en natuurherstelgebieden.

programme.title: We Hunt
programme.desc: Ilenia, fresca di abilitazione, e la vera protagonista di questo episodio in cui, insieme a Mauro, partecipa a unuscita in selezione che durera anche nel buio.

programme.title: Il capriolo: criteri per il riconoscimento in natura
programme.desc: Vediamo le caratteristiche dei maschi e delle femmine di questo splendido animale, come definirne leta e molto altro.

programme.title: Il muflone: ecologia e biologia
programme.desc: Scopriam tutte le caratteristiche biologiche e lhabitat del muflone.

programme.title: Lombardia: acqua, cultura e sapori
programme.desc: sapori 1. Frazioni pittoresche, vicoli silenziosi, scorci mozzafiato e ritmi coordinati a quelli della natura: siamo sulla piu grande isola lacustre dellEuropa del sud, Monte Isola.

programme.title: Millennials
programme.desc: Sono i giovani i protagonisti di questa nuova serie, dedicata a diverse discipline venatorie, affrontate con stili e modalita anche esse diverse.

programme.title: Cinghiale: corso di caccia e controllo
programme.desc: Introduciamo il concetto di centro di controllo mostrando come si fa la raccolta dei dati biometrici per ottenere la migliore gestione della specie.

programme.title: Cinghiale: corso di caccia e controllo
programme.desc: Approfondiamo la normativa che disciplina lattivita di controllo della fauna selvatica e le caratteristiche del piano straordinario per il controllo.

programme.title: Cinghiale: corso di caccia e controllo
programme.desc: Mettiamo in pratica quanto visto nelle lezioni teoriche e seguiamo sul campo lattivita di selezione del cinghiale in una giornata estiva.

programme.title: Cinghiale: corso di caccia e controllo
programme.desc: Partecipiamo a un intevento di controllo del cinghiale legato allemergenza della peste suina in unarea infetta.

programme.title: A scuola nel bosco
programme.desc: Analizziamo cio che avviene dopo il colpo: leviscerazione e ligiene della selvaggina, la giusta conservazione delle carni, la preparazione di insaccati per giungere in cucina.

programme.title: La ricarica a pallini
programme.desc: Oggi seguiamo la preparazione di una cartuccia in calibro 20 per la migratoria a inizio e fine stagione, con misurazione al banco di prova.

programme.title: La ricarica a pallini
programme.desc: Realizzazione di una cartuccia in calibro 20 per la caccia alla beccaccia, con relativa misurazione al banco di prova e prova di rosata.

programme.desc: Prosegue il resoconto di una entusiasmante cacciata autunnale a tordi e merli in Friuli.

programme.desc: Parliamo di balistica terminale e di come si identificano le aree vitali per il corretto prelievo dei selvatici.

programme.sub-title: Tipologie di caccia e implicazioni sulla qualità delle carni
programme.desc: Parliamo di balistica terminale e di come si identificano le aree vitali per il corretto prelievo dei selvatici.

programme.title: Ricordi di caccia
programme.sub-title: Storia di un setter di nome Poldo. 1a parte
programme.desc: Daniele Cinelli racconta la storia di Poldo e le difficolta nel gestire un cane che poi e diventato un grande cacciatore di beccacce.

programme.title: Il futuro della caccia
programme.desc: Ep. 1 Prime uscite al capriolo - Nella sezione Federcaccia della Provincia di Cuneo, un giovane cacciatore e un selecontrollore vanno a caccia di caprioli alla cerca.

programme.title: Speciale acquatici
programme.sub-title: Una passione di padre in figlio
programme.desc: Ep. 1 Una passione di padre in figlio - Nella esclusiva Valle Pierimpie, nella laguna sud di Venezia, Oliver Martini e suo padre trascorrono una fredda e limpida mattinata di caccia alle anatre.

programme.title: Amici per la piuma
programme.desc: A fine stagione Fabrizio Ventura mostra come, grazie alla doppietta Fausti Dea e ai suoi splendidi ausiliari, riuscira a conquistare le ultime beccacce rimaste.

programme.title: Le cacce del passato
programme.sub-title: A scuola e a caccia con larco
programme.desc: Un documentario di straordinario interesse, che vuol testimoniare come alcuni tipi di caccia del passato anche piu remoto sopravvivano ancora nel nostro mondo moderno.

programme.title: Storie di caccia e di cacciatori
programme.desc: Unavventura di caccia in Scozia con il ligure Marco Grandi, appassionato di cane da ferma che in questa occasione pratichera tipologie di caccia tipiche locali.

programme.title: Capriolo Forever
programme.desc: Torna con la terza stagione la serie dedicata al capriolo, il secondo ungulato piu cacciato nel nostro paese.

programme.title: Cervi senza frontiere
programme.desc: Giorgio Paraporti e il protagonista di due giornate di caccia al cervo in alta Valle Stura, che definire difficili e veramente poco...

programme.title: Addestrando allenando
programme.desc: Primo giorno di addestramento in Macedonia. Andrea e Giuseppe in un terreno in cui ci sono ancora starne autoctone, perfette per addestrare i giovani setter.

programme.title: Frammenti di caccia: cinghiale e 1
programme.desc: I Fratelli Lugari mostrano la caccia al cinghiale in battuta nei migliori posti dItalia, unendo avventure a caccia di selezione a caprioli e daini sugli Appennini.

programme.title: Manuale di ricarica
programme.sub-title: Tuning dellarma e prova delle munizioni ricaricate
programme.desc: Scopriamo come anche larma possa e debba essere preparata, vedendo come si monta un tuner e un freno di bocca.

programme.title: Luce Dei Tuoi Occhi
programme.desc: Nella lettera, Luigi ha confessato di avere investito Valentina con lauto di Enrico. Dopo il funerale, Luca chiede ad Emma ed Enrico di nasconderlo fino a quando riuscira a dimostrare la propria innocenza. Intanto, messo alle strette, Fontana confessa ad Enrico ed Emma di aver "comprato" Martina: ma non ha ucciso Luigi e non sa se Martina sia Alice. Intanto Davide e Luisa si sposano; poco dopo Luca si presenta in commissariato, ed emerge la verita sul ritorno della Conti a Vicenza. Oltre a Luisa anche suo marito Davide scopre tutto, sgomento e deluso: Alice e anche sua figlia! Anche in famiglia, Emma assiste alla reazione accesa del fratello Roberto e poi a quella delle sue ragazze: ora sanno di essere state scelte solo per la storia della loro nascita. La Conti pero adesso crede in loro: presenteranno la loro coreografia al Festival. Ora Emma vuole solo abbandonarsi allamore di Enrico ma riceve una telefonata che la turba.

programme.title: Un altro domani
programme.desc: Sergio continua a imporre le sue condizioni per la liquidazione. Ribero, Cloe e Elena decidono di rendergli le cose piu difficili possibile. Erik sembra finalmente accettare di scusarsi con Mario e di risarcirlo per aver rotto il suo giradischi. Ma quella che doveva essere una svolta si trasforma presto in un ennesimo conflitto che porta il giovane a prendere una decisione drastica. Carmen e Victor sono convinti che Patricia possa essere coinvolta nella cospirazione e la ragazza e determinata a smascherarla. Da parte sua, Kiros si sente sempre piu emarginato e rifiutato dai suoi colleghi.

programme.title: Vivere
programme.desc: Daria respinge la proposta di Andrea: non ha bisogno di alleati come azionista della Terhatex. Flavia e Diego ottengono un importante successo professionale. Tra Carla e Michele sta nascendo qualcosa che turba e stupisce entrambi. Ancora una volta Luca deve assecondare Carolina nelle sue frequentazioni artistiche, ma finisce per mettersi nei guai.

programme.title: Vivere
programme.desc: Flavia e Diego siglano un importante successo professionale a Rapallo. Intanto Christian e Daria trascorrono una romantica serata insieme, anche se Daria ha ancora dei momenti di insicurezza, dovuti ai contrasti con la famiglia di Christian. Alfio sconsiglia a Carla di seguire il piano di Andrea; la De Martini allora chiede al compagno di aiutarla, ma Alfio rifiuta adducendo motivazioni valide che infine la convincono. Luca rivela finalmente a Carolina che Cloe ci ha provato con lui.

programme.title: Vivere
programme.desc: Flavia e Diego sono partiti per Rapallo per concludere laccordo con Giudici, larmatore di Casta Diva, intenzionato a sperimentare le vele in terhatex sulla sua barca per la Norfolk Cup. Al loro rientro, lentusiasmo di Flavia si smorza, non solo dopo aver notato che Christian durante la sua assenza ha invitato Daria a passare la notte a casa sua, ma anche perche incappa in unarticolo dedicato alla Fontana, pubblicato sulla rivista Highligts. Daria, intanto, motivata a restare in azienda e a superare le ostilita con Flavia, si consulta con lavvocato Savio, ma lincontro casuale con la Draghi disattende le sue speranze, dimostrando che il conflitto e quanto mai aperto. Michele, intanto, ha ottenuto lambito ruolo di primario; a festeggiarlo, la famiglia, e poi, Cinzia, linfermiera con cui si era visto qualche volta, che laffascinante dottore decide di respingere in un serrato confronto.

programme.title: Distretto di Polizia
programme.desc: Sabina Corsi, di ritorno allalba da una festa, vaga per la citta, con sguardo perduto. Mauretta ha gli orecchioni e Ardenzi chiede aiuto a Francesca. In una villa alcune persone vengono tenute in ostaggio da ladri decisi a scassinare il caveau.

programme.title: Beautiful
programme.desc: Ridge (Thorsten Kaye) chiede a Thomas (Matthew Atkinson) a che punto e il suo rapporto con Hope (Annika Noelle), e dopo qualche esitazione Thomas gli confida di averle chiesto di sposarlo. Ovviamente Ridge vorrebbe conoscere la risposta di Hope, ma Thomas non puo dargliela perche Hope ha lasciato la questione in sospeso. Thomas spiega al padre che Hope ha bisogno di tempo per riflettere e nel frattempo ha accettato lanello di fidanzamento, ma lo porta appeso a una catenina al collo, e non al dito. Thomas si sente ottimista, mentre Ridge e perplesso, ma cerca di non darlo a vedere al figlio.

programme.title: Yasak Elma
programme.desc: Zeynep sente Halit dire ad Alihan che non vuole il bambino e che gestire una moglie incinta e complicato. Inoltre, e evidente che Zerrin osteggi la relazione con Alihan, ma Zeynep le tiene testa dicendole che la loro storia andra avanti comunque. Irem e a Istanbul da un po di mesi e invita Zeynep ad un suo concerto in un locale alternativo della citta. Durante la serata si crea uninaspettata sintonia tra lei e Hakan, pur appartenendo a due ceti sociali differenti. Nel frattempo Lila ed Emir continuano a incontrarsi in ufficio, ma la frequentazione e mal vista da Alihan, il quale vorrebbe che Emir tornasse a lavorare per lui. Zehra segue il consiglio di Kemal per la disintossicazione e i due si vedono tutti i giorni per fare jogging. Lei sembra aver trovato qualcuno che la comprenda e che la incoraggi a perseguire i suoi obiettivi. Ender prosegue nel suo piano per rovinare il matrimonio di Halit e Yildiz. Infine, Yildiz da la notizia della gravidanza ad Asuman.

programme.title: Yasak Elma
programme.desc: I gia delicati equilibri in casa Argun verranno messi a dura prova con larrivo di Asuman, la madre di Yildiz e Zeynep. Asuman e una donna molto forte che decide di stare vicino alla figlia durante la sua gravidanza. Questo creera tensioni tra sua figlia Yildiz e suo marito, Halit. Erim e Zehra non accolgono volentieri la madre di Yildiz, soprattutto Erim che cerchera conforto da sua madre, Ender. Nel frattempo, Alihan scopre chi era luomo che ha tradito suo padre e in preda a uno scatto di ira, devasta mezza casa. Zeynep, appena viene informata di quanto accaduto si precipita da Alihan per aiutarlo, ma sara costretta a chiedere ad Hakan di occuparsene. Nel frattempo, Yildiz e sua madre iniziano a comportarsi in modo strano. Che sia per lincontro tra Kemal e Asuman, alla Holding Argun?

programme.title: La forza di una donna
programme.desc: Doruk si sveglia cercando suo padre e Bahar si decide a dire a lui e Nisan che Sarp e morto e non tornera mai piu, ma Doruk continua a sostenere di averlo visto. Intanto, Hatice chiede a Enver di tornare a casa da lei quando uscira dallospedale e gli promette di prendersi cura di Bahar, suscitando lennesima scenata di gelosia da parte di Sirin. Poi, Hatice va a casa di Bahar e aiuta le ragazze a finire di cucire tutte le camicie. Poco dopo, pero, Arif comunica a lei e Ceyda che Abbas e stato espulso dal paese. Infine, Piril ricorda la notte in cui ha conosciuto Sarp, quando il suo ex, Mert, e morto e la colpa e ricaduta su Sarp.

programme.title: Dentro La Notizia
programme.desc: Il nuovo programma pomeridiano dinformazione condotto da Gianluigi Nuzzi con approfondimenti su storie, fatti e attualita.

programme.title: Avanti un altro!
programme.desc: Il game show piu bizzarro della tv dove, nel gioco finale, per vincere, bisogna dare 21 risposte sbagliate! Leggerezza e buon umore. Conduce Paolo Bonolis, affiancato da Luca Laurenti.

programme.desc: Gerry Scotti e al timone dello storico game show, affiancato da Samira. La tradizione incontra linnovazione con tante novita come la Ruota delle Meraviglie e premi da sogno!

programme.title: Paperissima Sprint
programme.desc: Con Juliana Moreira, Vittorio Brumotti e limmancabile Gabibbo. Filmati inediti di papere, gaffe ed errori tv da tutto il mondo ed oltre 270 sketch inediti allinsegna dei tormentoni musicali.

programme.title: Luce Dei Tuoi Occhi
programme.desc: Azzurra fugge portando con se la piccola Cecilia. E se il motivo di un gesto cosi improvviso avesse a che fare con il furto di Alice? Enrico ed Emma scoprono che era stata Azzurra ad occuparsi delle pratiche ospedaliere di Emma mentre era tra la vita e la morte dopo il parto. La polizia la cerca, ma e Emma a trovare Azzurra, che le racconta sconvolta il motivo della fuga: Roberto era stato con Luigi la notte in cui luomo e stato ucciso. Roberto confessa lomicidio ed anche la verita sulla vendita di Alice in cambio dei soldi che gli servivano per saldare dei debiti. Non sa dove sia ora, nessuno la sa piu. Un momento difficile per la famiglia e per Emma, che pero ormai puo contare sullamore di Enrico. Dopo il successo della sua coreografia e delle ragazze, Emma si sofferma nel teatro vuoto: sua figlia potrebbe essere ovunque, eppure le sembra di intravederla proprio in quella ragazza che balla da sola sul palco vuoto. La ricerca di Alice non ha ancora scritto la sua ultima...

programme.title: Un altro domani
programme.desc: Julia sospetta che qualcuno abbia rubato i suoi disegni dei mobili e punta il dito contro Sergio. Nel frattempo, Dani continua a passare il tempo con il padre, il che desta i sospetti di Elena, che non e disposta a lasciare che il figlio subisca una delusione. A Rio Muni, Carmen chiede a Mabale se ha visto qualcosa di sospetto nella fabbrica, ma lui nega, sotto la pressione di Patricia. Patricia preoccupata dallinsistenza di Carmen cerca di convincere Francisco a fermarla. Nonostante le difficolta, Carmen ottiene una confessione importante. Una verita che anche Ines e Angel inseguono, sempre piu convinti che laltro nasconda informazioni molto importanti sulla notte in cui Alicia e stata uccisa. Julia e Leo si incontrano per caso e hanno un piccolo battibecco.

programme.title: Vivere
programme.desc: Carolina ha un forte litigio con Luca a proposito dei suoi rapporti di amicizia con Cloe; subito dopo e colta dal sospetto di essere incinta e percepisce questa possibilita come un intoppo alla sua carriera. Rebecca, in ansia per la lettura della sentenza del processo per la morte di Letizia, riceve una telefonata da Claudia. Rebecca decide di non presentarsi in aula e Andrea la raggiunge nel suo studio: lui ha ascoltato il verdetto finale. Dopo un incontro casuale con Daria che finisce in una spiacevole discussione, Flavia decide che vuole riprendersi quello che e suo; va a trovare Carla decisa ad accettare la proposta di Andrea. Nel frattempo le cose tra Daria e Christian vanno bene: lui decide di cercare un appartamento per vivere insieme.

programme.title: Distretto di Polizia
programme.desc: Il ragazzo di Sabina confessa a Giulia Corsi di aver comprato della droga in una discoteca. Il commissario fa fingere alcuni agenti di essere degli spacciatori.

programme.title: Buongiorno, mamma! - Dove eravamo rimasti
programme.desc: In attesa del ritorno di Buongiorno, mamma! in 1^TV, ripercorriamo le vicende della famiglia Borghi nelle prime due stagioni della serie.

programme.title: Beautiful
programme.desc: Poppy e Luna continuano a parlare dello sconosciuto padre di Luna. Luna fa capire alla madre che nonostante la ami moltissimo, ha comunque sentito la mancanza di un padre nella sua vita e vorrebbe sapere chi e. Poppy si mette a piangere e le dice che, pur comprendendo questa esigenza, ha sempre sperato che la figlia fosse felice anche con un solo genitore. Brooke (Katherine Kelly Lang) mette alle strette Hope e le chiede a che punto siano i suoi rapporti con Thomas. Hope e sulla difensiva perche sa che la madre detesta Thomas. Ma le dice ugualmente che Thomas le ha chiesto di sposarlo. Thomas (Matthew Atkinson) mostra a Ridge (Thorsten Kaye) una foto dellanello di fidanzamento che ha offerto a Hope (Annika Noelle) e che lei porta al collo come un ciondolo. Ridge, molto orgoglioso di lui, lo incoraggia e lo sostiene, ma Thomas teme ancora il giudizio di Brooke (Katherine Kelly Lang) che ha sempre osteggiato il loro rapporto.

programme.title: Yasak Elma
programme.desc: I gia delicati equilibri in casa Argun verranno messi a dura prova con larrivo di Asuman, la madre di Yildiz e Zeynep. Asuman e una donna molto forte che decide di stare vicino alla figlia durante la sua gravidanza. Questo creera tensioni tra sua figlia Yildiz e suo marito, Halit. Erim e Zehra non accolgono volentieri la madre di Yildiz, soprattutto Erim che cerchera conforto da sua madre, Ender. Nel frattempo, Alihan scopre chi era luomo che ha tradito suo padre e in preda a uno scatto di ira, devasta mezza casa. Zeynep, appena viene informata di quanto accaduto si precipita da Alihan per aiutarlo, ma sara costretta a chiedere ad Hakan di occuparsene. Nel frattempo, Yildiz e sua madre iniziano a comportarsi in modo strano. Che sia per lincontro tra Kemal e Asuman, alla Holding Argun?

programme.title: Yasak Elma
programme.desc: Yildiz, dopo aver scoperto di aver perso il bambino, decide di tenere segreta la notizia, tentando di conquistare lattenzione di Halit. La madre Asuman e sua complice. Zeynep cerca di capire cosa abbia portato Alihan a perdere la testa. Luomo continua a mentirle, ma ha una nuova reazione violenta e incontrollata quando Zeynep nomina Halit. La ragazza, inconsapevole della vera ragione dellinquietudine di Alihan, ha infatti contattato sua cugina Irem per suonare alla festa di Erim, dopo che Caner le ha chiesto aiuto. Alihan decide di prendere parte alla festa, e chiede ad Hakan di partecipare. Il suo amico accetta assicurandogli che gli dara il suo supporto, comunque lui decida di agire nei confronti di Halit. Intanto Halit, avendo capito che suo figlio Erim e a disagio con Asuman, fa intendere alla donna di non essere benvoluta alla festa, scatenando cosi lira di Yildiz.

programme.title: La forza di una donna
programme.desc: Jale, per errore, rivela a Bahar che un uomo di nome Sarp e andato in ospedale a trovare Enver durante il suo ricovero. Hatice le chiarisce che probabilmente si tratta del figlio del fruttivendolo, molto legato a Enver. Bahar decide quindi di indagare e parlare con il fruttivendolo per scoprire la verita, anche perche il piccolo Doruk afferma di aver visto suo padre in ospedale. Ceyda e Yeliz cercano di avvisare Sirin, incoraggiandola a informare il fruttivendolo prima che Bahar arrivi. Sarp chiede a Suat se ci sono aggiornamenti su sua madre.

programme.title: Dentro La Notizia
programme.desc: Il nuovo programma pomeridiano dinformazione condotto da Gianluigi Nuzzi con approfondimenti su storie, fatti e attualita.

programme.title: Avanti un altro!
programme.desc: Il game show piu bizzarro della tv dove, nel gioco finale, per vincere, bisogna dare 21 risposte sbagliate! Leggerezza e buon umore. Conduce Paolo Bonolis, affiancato da Luca Laurenti.

programme.desc: Anticipazione delle notizie principali a cura della redazione giornalistica di Canale 5.

programme.title: La ruota della fortuna
programme.desc: Gerry Scotti e al timone dello storico game show, affiancato da Samira. La tradizione incontra linnovazione con tante novita come la Ruota delle Meraviglie e premi da sogno!

programme.title: Meteo.it
programme.desc: Previsioni meteorologiche del territorio italiano, diviso per zone geografiche, dettagliate e costantemente aggiornate.

programme.title: Riassunto - Tradimento
programme.desc: La famiglia ideale esiste davvero? Guzide, una rispettata giudice e madre di due splendidi figli, e felicemente sposata con Tarik da ben 30 anni e ne e certa. Ma la verita e ben diversa...

programme.title: Tradimento
programme.desc: Tutta la famiglia e contraria alla decisone di Oylum, soprattutto Kahraman, che accetta di starle vicino durante loperazione, ma che e convinto di voler divorziare appena la ragazza stara meglio. Serra confida ad Alper di voler partorire il figlio di Tolga per ottenere parte della sua eredita.

programme.title: Tradimento
programme.desc: Tolga viene sottoposto al trapianto del rene, donato da Oylum. Tutta la famiglia attende lesito delloperazione in ospedale, insieme ad Oltan. Azra va a trovare Selin in carcere e le comunica della donazione del rene di Oylum. Selin e sconvolta. Dundar va a cercare Guzide a casa, e trova solo Yesim, che vorrebbe trattenerlo fino al ritorno di Guzide, ma senza dirgli che si trova in ospedale ne il motivo. Serra indice una conferenza stampa, durante la quale afferma che e incinta di Tolga, e mostra davanti alle telecamere il test del DNA. La famiglia di Guzide apprende la notizia mentre attende lesito dellintervento. Ozan non ci crede, ritiene quello di Serra un bluff. Mualla e Ilknur, cosi come Ipek, apprendono dalla televisione la notizia della conferenza stampa e le accuse di Serra, e sono scandalizzate e sorprese. Kahraman e sempre piu afflitto, e se ne va dallospedale intenzionato a divorziare da Oylum. Lo dice con rabbia anche a Mualla.

programme.title: Tradimento
programme.desc: Kahraman va in ospedale da Oylum ma la trova in lacrime nella stanza di Tolga. Deluso da quello che vede, se ne va senza salutarla. Oylum, stranita dalla sua latitanza, gli telefona e gli chiede di portarle Can, sperando cosi di vedere sia lui sia il bambino. Lindomani, Nazan e Mualla arrivano in ospedale con Can, e Oylum intuisce che Kahraman non la voglia vedere. Oltan veglia il figlio sperando che si svegli. Viene raggiunto da Ashen e Nedret che lo ringraziano per averla fatta pagare a Emrah. Guzide assiste alla scena ed e delusa dal fatto che Oltan sia ricorso alla violenza per punire Emrah. Nel mentre, pero, riceve una telefonata da Esra che la avvisa che Emrah e Kadir, il suo amico, sono stati arrestati. Oylum viene dimessa e chiede di essere portata a casa sua. Giunta li, incontra Kahraman che, con freddezza, ammette di essere stato in ospedale e di aver visto la scena di Oylum che teneva la mano a Tolga.

programme.title: Luce Dei Tuoi Occhi
programme.desc: Emma non e riuscita a trovare Alice, ma il rapporto con Enrico e sempre piu solido. Nelle nuove audizioni in Accademia, emergono due ragazze: Vicky e Diana, diverse tra loro ma ugualmente competitive. La madre di Diana, Petra Novack confessa ad Emma di essere gravemente malata, e le chiede di prendersi cura della ragazza: questa richiesta nasconde unaltra verita, che lascia Emma sorpresa ed impaurita.

programme.sub-title: Christmas / The Bet / The Watch / The Bumpkin / The Flakers / The Authority / The Virus
programme.desc: The Wattersons run over Santa Claus and must save Christmas. / Bobert loses a bet to Gumball so has to obey him for 24 hours. / Gumball and Darwin receive an heirloom from Richard but lose it. / Gumball asks Idaho to teach his family to live a simpler life. / Gumball teaches Darwin a lesson after Darwin leaves him. / Granny JoJos overprotective behavior puts the Wattersons in danger. / Gumball thinks Teri is way too scared of germs. / Gumball destroys Alan and Carmens relationship and has to reunite them.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Pony / The Dream / The Sidekick / The Hero / The Photo
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin rent a film called A Ponys Tail to watch with Anais but keep getting distracted on their way home. / Darwin kisses Penny in one of Gumballs dreams and gets mad. / Gumball and Darwin try to get a game back from Tobias but Darwin starts to feel like a sidekick to Gumball and refuses to follow his orders. / Richard overhears Gumball and Darwin making fun of him which hurts his feelings and he has to regain his reputation as a hero. / Gumball tries to look good in the school photo. / Gumball and Darwin cheat on their maths test get detention and have to escape.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Tag / The Limit / The Game / The Voice / The Promise / The Castle / The Boombox / The Sweaters

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin help Anais rescue her doll from Tina Rex. / Gumball experiences an impossibly unfortunate chain of events. / Gumball and Darwin accidentally destroy Mr Robinson’s new car… or do they?

programme.sub-title: The Prince and The Swoony Swanstress / The Prince and The Feather Fluffer-Upper Part 1 / The Prince and The Feather Fluffer-Upper Part 2 / The Prince and The Feast Of The Fopdoodles
programme.desc: Prince Ivandoe and Bert take a lovely, but lost and confused, Swanstress under their wing. / Prince Ivandoe agrees to fetch Princess Syllabob an all-powerful Trident. programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Jeff and Sumo expect no one to show up at Clarence’s birthday party, just like last year. When dozens of kids arrive, the boys struggle to get face time with Clarence, the popular party host.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Gumball is given a cursed videogame console Elmore becomes trapped inside a fantasy RPG world. Gumball Darwin and Anais have to battle their way through town unraveling the secrets of their new virtual reality. But theyll have to level up if theyre going to stand any chance against the mysterious final boss.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: After defeating Brother Blood, the Titans reward themselves with a trip to the nail salon. / Robin is ready to answer a crime alert but the other Titans are in no rush. / The Titans discover a sleeping gorilla in their kitchen and must silently return it to the zoo. / Robin and The Joker swap roles and lead each others teams.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Catch up on all your favourite episodes from Season 3 of The Amazing World of Gumball! From wacky school days to crazy family fun, theres never a dull moment in Gumballs world.

programme.desc: After Shag discovers his Dad’s old racing car toys, everyone in town excitedly gets into racing each other with the tiny cars. / Huck amps up the fun at the annual Jellystone block party by inviting a bunch of party cavemen.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy chases after the Lemmings, who have loaded a jar of Yummy into their remote-control driven car. / Just as Grizzy settles into the couch by the fireside, the Lemmings come charging into the living room on their new mount, the vacuum cleaner. / When the Lemmings spoil Grizzys meal with their new game, the bear evicts them far from the cabin. They crash onto a faraway picnic table.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean embarks on plenty of adventures, along with his sidekick, Teddy. They try to stay out of the way of Mrs Wicket and her cat Scrapper, but often end up in trouble.

programme.desc: Robin challenges the gang not to use their powers - and theyre more successful than he suspects! / The Titans overuse Ravens dark magic causing unintended consequences. / When Robin Cyborg and Beast Boy get trapped in an elevator the limits of their friendship are tested while Starfire and Raven bond with a supervillain. / Starfire convinces the reluctant Titans to try defeating their enemies with compassion rather than violence.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Helmet / The Fight / The End

programme.title: Craig of the Creek

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Richard has lost all of the family’s money. Nicole is happy for the Wattersons to appear in a Joyful Burger commercial for some much needed cash. / Darwin joins the school marching band and his tin-whistle talent lands him the solo.

programme.title: Apple and Onion
programme.desc: Apple and Onion run out of toilet paper because Apples been building a huge modern art sculpture with it. Theyre going to need more if Apple is to finish and Onion is to be able to resume his normal toilet activities.

programme.desc: Prismo needs Finn and Jake’s help to stop a catastrophic event from happening somewhere in the multiverse. / Trapped and alone, Finn must unravel the riddle of the weird cave with no exit.

programme.sub-title: The Deal / The Line / The Singing

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Lady / The Sucker / The Cage
programme.desc: When Gumball and Darwin see a mysterious lady leaving their house, they follow her to find out who she is. / Gumball spends all day with Bomb Kid who discovers that he may well be unprankable. / Gumball and Darwin discover that their teacher, Mr Corneille, has a secret life as a fighter. / The Wattersons look back on Anais first days in the Watterson house. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The One / The Vegging / The Father

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Plan / The Internet / The Finale / The World / The Return / The Nemesis / The Crew
programme.desc: The Watterson kids come up with a fool-proof plan. / Gumball accidentally uploads a video of himself and wants it gone. / The Wattersons are surprised to discover that their past actions have consequences. / The life of the background objects of Elmore are shown in a series of short skits. / Richard is in charge of getting the kids to their first day back at school on time but hes overslept and now he cant find them, he has to retrace his steps. / Gumball and Darwin come face-to-face with their arch-nemesis. But is this super-villain out of control? / Gumball and Darwin attempt to join the baddest crew in town: the senior citizens! / Gumball and Darwin are shocked to realise that their class isnt the only one in Elmore Junior High.

programme.sub-title: The Routine / The Parking / The Upgrade / The Comic / The Romantic / The Uploads / The Wicked / The Traitor

Their thoughts turn to how they first met and started on their Quest.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: Apple and Onion
programme.desc: Hot Dog has the audition of his life but he is missing something crucial. Apple and Onion are tasked with bringing it to him and they are adamant that nothing will stand in their way.

programme.title: Jellystone!
programme.desc: Top Cat and the gang accidentally transform the town when they sell expired fish sticks to everyone. / Huckleberry Hound hires Yogi to direct an exciting video about Jellystone, but things get a little too exciting for his tastes.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Richard is in charge of getting the kids to their first day back at school on time but hes overslept and now he cant find them, he has to retrace his steps.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!

programme.desc: Lex Luthor buys the Titans island and shows them how to make passive income through real estate. / After they receive a distress call, Robin, Raven, and Birdarang rush off to help the Winged Warriors, a society dedicated to birds. / Robin installs two security cameras to catch the thief who keeps stealing his overnight oats. / Robin hosts a DC Comics book club but the other Titans may not have done the assigned reading.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: When Clarence meets JT, the kid who mows their lawn, he finds a fast friend who shows him some cool new music, a new outlook on life, and coolest of all - a sweet rat-tail! Clarence leans into the rat rail lifestyle, discovering a whole new side of Aberdale he never knew existed.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Catch up on all your favourite episodes from Season 4 of The Amazing World of Gumball! From wacky school days to crazy family fun, theres never a dull moment in Gumballs world.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.sub-title: Favorite Animated Show Nominee / DC Leader Swap / Shhh
programme.desc: Robin finds it suspicious that the Titans are always nominated for an award but never win and is determined to find out why. / Robin and The Joker swap roles and lead each others teams. / The Titans discover a sleeping gorilla in their kitchen and must silently return it to the zoo. / Robin is ready to answer a crime alert but the other Titans are in no rush.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin attempt to join the baddest crew in town: the senior citizens! / Gumball and Darwin are shocked to realise that their class isnt the only one in Elmore Junior High.

programme.title: Apple and Onion
programme.desc: Apple and Onion spend a day in Falafels shoes and use their positive attitude to prove he shouldnt be so grumpy. / Apple needs to be tall so that he can be in love.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Jake learns that Finn’s been having clandestine meetings with a powerful wizard. But what are they up to? / Finn and Jake infiltrate the Banana Guard ranks and stumble upon a conspiracy.

programme.title: Regular Show
programme.desc: Mordecai has to tell Cloudy J that his text was auto-corrected to say "I like you, Hi".

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Neighbor / The Pact / The Faith
programme.desc: The kids realise that theyve never known their neighbours name, and theyre way past the window where they can ask. / Gumball has something uncomfortable to tell Penny but doesnt know how, until he makes a deal with Principal Brown. / Elmore has been plunged into black and white and Gumball and Darwin have to figure out whats going on. / Gumball and Anais go head to head in a leadership election voted for by their classmates.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Anybody / The Shippening / The Brain
programme.desc: Clayton realises he can imitate his classmates, and begins stealing the lives of the people of Elmore. / When unexpected couples in the world of Elmore start randomly falling in love, Gumball and Darwin have to figure out whats going on. / Anais has been facepalming every time her family does something stupid which has led to a serious medical condition. / Gumball questions Mr Smalls eco-friendly commitment, causing him to abandon society and live in the forest.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Awareness / The Parents / The Founder
programme.desc: Leslie calls Gumballs bluff. / After accidentally bumping into each other in the grocery aisle Nicole and her parents have it out. / Richard Watterson gets mistaken for the founder of Chanax and destroys the company. / Gumball and Darwin spend a day in Larrys shoes, doing all the menial jobs in Elmore.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Signal / The Girlfriend / The Parasite / The Love / The Scam / The Awkwardness / The Nest
programme.desc: Gumball develops a strange stutter and it makes him accidentally offend Darwin. / Jamie has decided she needs a sweetheart and Darwin is the best candidate, unluckily for him. / Anais has made a new friend, but Gumball and Darwin arent sure their relationship is equal. / Bobert finds he is infected with a virus called love.exe. He asks Gumball and Darwin to give him a definition for the word. / Gumball, Darwin and Carrie team up to convince their fellow students that the school is haunted. / Gumball is walking in the same direction as Hot Dog Guy, and with each step it becomes increasingly awkward. / Elmore residents are going missing, and the cause of these disappearances may be closer to home than Gumball and Darwin think. / Gumball and Darwin agree to do all of Tobiass chores, in exchange for "good points"!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Bus / The Night / The Misunderstandings / The Roots / The Blame
programme.desc: When Rocky suggests that the Elmore Junior High kids skip school the bus is boarded by criminals who seem to want to teach them the importance of school attendance. / Ever wondered what the people of Elmore dream about? As night falls in Elmore the Moon takes us on a tour through the various dreams - and nightmares - of the inhabitants. / Gumball is late to meet Penny at the mall, but a series of misunderstandings on the way only delay him further. / When Mom sees Darwin gazing longingly at a fish-tank she thinks their mammalian lifestyle isn’t fulfilling her adopted son and deep down he longs to connect with his fishy roots. / The Parent Teacher Association of Elmore Junior High bans video games, so the kids try and prove that games arent a bad influence. / Tobias follows every single high-five with a butt-slap so when Gumball doesn’t get one he feels insulted. He tries to get Tobias to slap his rear all day but it doesn’t work.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Detective / The Fury / The Compilation / The Disaster / The Fan / The Kids / The Joy / The Coach

She realises Gumball and Darwin are the chief suspects. / A mysterious figure from Nicoles past shows up and challenges her to a fight, but the kids are surprised when she refuses. / A compilation of some of the funniest, most bizarre clips uploaded onto the internet by the people of Elmore. / When Rob purchases a universal remote from the Awesome Store he discovers he can control the universe. He rewinds into the past and remembers Gumball had left him in The Void. / Sarah the new kid in school is Gumball and Darwins number one slightly obsessive fan. / Whilst Gumball and Darwin make fun of Mum and Dad for being old their voices start to break. / Miss Simian has to save herself from a contagious Joy virus infecting the whole school. / The new coach at Elmore High stands up to Jamie. / The secret behind Antons immortality.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Anais is convinced that Gumball is being bullied by Tina Rex. / Gumball is desperate to avoid a late fee on the rented dvd he accidentally destroyed. / Gumball and Darwin are convinced that the world will end in 24 hours.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Control Freak leads the Titans on a chase through various cartoon intro sequences. / The Titans make wishes on a wishbone, but when its broken, they must travel to Gobble-Gobble Land to set things right. / Starfire is the captain of a spaceship heading back to her home planet of Tarmaran and her crew is some of Earths finest specimens / Seeing the benefits of being captain, Freak demands the position which worries the rest of the crew.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!

programme.desc: Robin finds it suspicious that the Titans are always nominated for an award but never win and is determined to find out why. / Robin and The Joker swap roles and lead each others teams. / The Titans discover a sleeping gorilla in their kitchen and must silently return it to the zoo. / Robin is ready to answer a crime alert but the other Titans are in no rush.

programme.desc: Masha involves the Bear into gaming and it worsens his relationship with female Bear… The situation becomes absurd and resolves only when the game is over! / The technologies sometime can teach us a human lesson like in this story about two robots that suddenly fall in love with each other… / It’s always important to remember who your friends are. Masha is almost ready for the New Year when ghosts of the past visit her. / Masha tries to fall into winter sleep like the Bear but counting sheep spoils the pleasure! The lullaby turns into hilarious party with lots of dancing and singing! / The wolves come up with a new idea how to get a stable and nutritious food source… they rob a poultry farm and get a…rooster. / The Bear prepares a present for Female Bear and hopes to give it personally but unexpected battle with the bees ruins his hopes. / A spaceship makes an emergency landing in the Bears courtyard. The aliens need to urgently replenish their supplies. Masha and Mishka help them fix the ship and return home. / Panda and Masha are fooling around for days. To cope with stress Bear needs a good rest. Will he be able to restore internal forces or two fidgets will not give him peace?

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.sub-title: Cry Wolf / Sheep on the Road / Mams Day / Alarm on the Beach / Hot Air
programme.desc: Norman accidentally sets off Dilys new fire alarm so she confiscates his football. Unfortunately Norman and Woolly go out resulting in Trevors bus swerving off the road. / Its Mothers Day but Norman only wants to go skateboarding. He makes Dilys a very unsafe candle holder and when she takes it to the Whole Fish Cafe a fire starts. / When James and Mandy find a crate on the beach they try to open it but end up trapping James legs under the crate. / Its a very hot day in Pontypandy and Trevor Evans refuses to accept that his old bus may not make it up the mountain. They crash onto a faraway picnic table. / The Lemmings are holding a log throwing competition that stops short when Grizzy sends them soaring into the distance. / Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the TV remote control. The argument leads the bear to the summit of the castle tower during a storm. / The Lemmings have a whale of a time revamping the paintings on display in the castle by painting themselves alongside the illustrated noblemen. / The Lemmings improvise a trampoline with bagpipes, only each jump is accompanied by a deafening outburst. / Grizzy stops the Lemmings furious rodeo game on a sheep. / Grizzy banishes the Lemmings to the castle dungeons.

programme.desc: Mr Bean is determined to have a go on a kids’ fire engine ride in a supermarket. / Mr Bean destroys a flower delivery for Mrs Wicket so goes on a mission to replace it, one flower at a time!

The Bear is fed and decides to make the ultimate growing potion.

programme.title: Masha and the Bear
programme.sub-title: Best Medicine / New Kids on the Block! / Twinkle Twinkle Little Star / What a Wonderful Game / Thats your Cue!
programme.desc: Masha falls ill. It is not easy to be ill but its so nice when there are those who are always ready to take care and entertain. Nothing is impossible for our heroes! / Hockey is a game for the most courageous strong and dexterous! All you need is a united experienced team and a talented coach who can lead them to victory. / An old friend comes to visit the Bear. He brings along an amazing game - billiards. Isnt it an excuse to have fun and compete? / Summer is a time of rest and miracles. How nice is just to sit on the river bank with your best friends! However everything is not so simple in our story.

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.sub-title: Danger by the Double / When Fools Rush In / Blow Me Down / Pontypandy Extreme
programme.desc: James and Sarah will not stop competing. When a fire starts in the forest they are too busy trying to out do each other to realize they are in danger. / James wants to get Bronwyn something special for her birthday and borrows Station Officer Steeles metal detector to find ancient coins but he gets trapped near the cliffs. / Station Officer Steele gets out his kite and pretends its his nephews. When he tries to fly it at the Floods house it gets stuck on the roof. / Norman is upset when Trevor runs over his skateboard. Not prepared to wait for a new board Norman decides to retrieve coins from the bottom of a wishing well and buy one himself. / Fireman Elvis Cridlington breaks his leg dancing around the Fire Station and begins to wonder if he is really cut out to be a fireman.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.sub-title: Pet Sheep / Sheep Joust / Foodie Phantoms / Bookfair / Unpractical Cabin / The Bear, The Frog and the Mosquito / Musical Battle
programme.desc: The Lemmings take Polaroid snapshots of themselves disguised outside the castle along with a sheep who poses with them. / Grizzy is pulled out of his dreams by the rambunctious Lemmings who are jousting on sheep. / With a ring that lets their astral bodies travel, the Lemmings decide to haunt Grizzy. / Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a giant jelly cake. / The Lemmings discover a card that enables them to teleport a magic closet. / The Lemmings have fun bouncing off the backs of harmless green frogs while Grizzy chases some mosquitos buzzing around him in vain. / Grizzy comes home to the cabin and discovers the super fired-up Lemmings dancing madly to the sound of the ghetto blaster. / Straddling bats, the Lemmings organize an obstacle course in the pitch-dark cabin.

programme.title: Masha and the Bear
programme.sub-title: Monkey Business / God Save the Queen / All the Worlds a Stage / Around the World in One Day / Who am I? / Something Yummy / Big Hike
programme.desc: No child likes to live by the rules: clean up after themselves learn do homework in time... Its much more interesting to go on a fun adventure with new friends. / Masha dreams of royal life. Will these dreams come true and what does it really mean to live like a king? / The best remedy for boredom is a good game. And a good play is even better. That is exactly what our friends decided. Its just not so easy to agree on what kind of play to stage.. / The Bear is preparing to go on a world trip but a last minute accident makes him panic. / Who to be when you grow up? Finding the answer to this question is one of the most difficult processes for each child. Masha is no exception. / Everyone has their own favorite food. Our friends are ready to enjoy something delicious in the new episode. Can a treat be tasty and healthy at the same time? / When we crave for adventures and new experiences, we take sleeping bags and a tent and go camping. We will admire amazing landscapes, climb a mountain and even see real volcanoes! / What is inside such seemingly simple objects surrounding us? How are the mechanisms that we use every day arranged? Maybe they work with the help of magic?

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.sub-title: Fireworks for Mandy / Heap of Trouble / Stuck in the Muck / Sausages Vs. Shrimps / Floods Flood
programme.desc: While playing hide-and-seek in the mountains with Norman Mandy finds a distress flare. Norman wants to let it off but Mandy resists fearing that it could be dangerous. / For the Pontypandy Flower and Vegetable show Mike is entering a marrow that has been growing on compost. But he did not heed Sams advice about turning it over regularly. / Theres trouble for Trevor Evans as the school bus breaks down in the Pontypandy hills. programme.title: Bluey

When Bingo makes Dad break the ‘No Dancing’ rule, he is fired. programme.desc: Dad has rudely plonked himself on one end of the seesaw. So Bluey and Bingo round up the entire playground to help flip him off, but they still need to find one more friend.

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Carrot is determined to save Supertato from Evil Peas trap without help from Prickly Pear.

programme.title: JoJo and Gran Gran
programme.desc: JoJo has a sleepover at Gran Grans but is confused when bedtime comes while its still light outside! Gran Gran creates their own starry sky for JoJo.

programme.title: Stan Can
programme.desc: Morris has a surprise for Pearl… new weightlifting equipment. Stan helps Morris deliver it all to their houseboat, but its so heavy the boat starts to sink.

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say ‘gloves’, and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of different types of gloves – green gloves, gold gloves, woolly gloves, fingerless gloves and glowing gloves. Dee and a friend get messy with a pair of muddy gloves. The journey is repeated with some special surprises along the way, and everyone has a boogie when Dee’s friend finally succeeds in saying today’s word.

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say dog, and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of different dogs and explore how they look and what they do. We see a tiny dog, a fluffy dog and a very waggy-tailed happy dog! We meet a funny sausage dog and enjoy a spotty dog surprise. The journey is repeated with some special surprises along the way, and everyone has a boogie when Dees friend finally succeeds in saying todays word.

programme.title: Dog Squad
programme.desc: Tinks is a disability assistance dog for her owner Charli, who has a condition that makes it painful for her to pick things up or to push and pull things. Tinks uses her superfetch skills to help Charli every day. The smallest of the Dog Squad gang, Tinks is a little Lhasa Apso with lots of big dog energy. Charli has been invited to a party but is feeling a bit nervous about going. Tinks loves helping Charli feel confident. She wants to help Charli feel good about herself so she can go and have fun at the party. Tinks fetches Charlis hair brush so Charli can brush her newly-dyed pink hair, and then helps Charli choose a party outfit. And, when Charli cant find her keys, Tinks dives into a mountain of clothes on the bed to search for them. Now theyre party ready, but its raining! Tinks is determined to help Charli get to the party, even in the rain. But how? She summons all her big dog energy and sets off in search of a plan. Just wait until Dog Squad hear about this!

programme.title: Spot Bots
programme.desc: Help the Spot Bots complete the Zooples and get super switched on. Today, Cubi is in a tickling mood.

programme.title: Tinpo
programme.desc: Po has to pack up his home so another Po can move into the house before sun down - and he needs help!

programme.title: Graces Amazing Machines
programme.desc: Grace looks at three amazing transport machines: a car carrier, a furniture lift and a container ship.

programme.title: Nina and the Neurons: Brilliant Bodies
programme.desc: Nina investigates how broken bones get better... with the help of Felix, her touch neuron.

programme.title: My World Kitchen
programme.desc: Naima is cooking a special Algerian Borek. Borek is made from pastry, mashed potato, meat, cheese and you can even add olives. She cant wait for her friends to taste it!

programme.title: Number One Newton Avenue
programme.desc: Its all about patterns today as Freddie uses his magic binoculars to solve a mystery.

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say ‘blanket’, and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of different blankets – a blue blanket, a baby blanket, a woolly blanket and a picnic blanket! Dee hops around on a patchwork blanket, and we see her and a friend wrap up in a warm blanket. The journey is repeated with some special surprises along the way, and everyone has a boogie when Dee’s friend finally succeeds in saying today’s word!

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say ‘feather’, and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of different types of feathers – a grey feather, a spotty feather, a fluffy feather and a unicorn feather. There’s a help-you-fly feather, some fluffy feathers and even a drawing feather! The journey is repeated with some special surprises along the way, and everyone has a boogie when Dee’s friend finally succeeds in saying today’s word!

programme.title: Andys Aquatic Adventures
programme.sub-title: Andy and the Fur Seal Pup
programme.desc: When Mr Hammond notices a fur seal pup wandering alone in a forest away from the ocean, its up to Andy to find out why.

programme.title: Ranger Hamzas Eco Quest
programme.desc: Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers discover how lavender plays an important role in the environment. They find out that lavender attracts pollinators like bees and butterflies.

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Supertato is out chasing a milkshake robot and leaves Broccoli in charge of Tato Tower. Evil Pea tries to take over the tower, but Broccoli puts on a great defence.

programme.title: Dog Squad
programme.desc: Disability assistance dog Tinks visits Clip-Clop Stables with Charli, where they meet a very tall horse called Mist who is taking Charli for her first ever horse-riding lesson.

programme.title: Dog Squad
programme.desc: Rayane and Diesel have been practising with the metal detector in the garden. At the beach, Diesel helps Mum find the perfect spot for a picnic.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Judo wants to play in the dirt with Bluey and Bingo, but she’s not supposed to get dirty.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: After Dad ignores Bingo, trouble comes to the Heelers house, which fills up with invisible mischief-making fairies. Tails are braided, Mum gets a peg beard and Dad’s phone ends up in fairy dancing circle! Mum suspects someone hurt the fairies’ feelings and sends Bingo to see what they want. Bingo leads the family to a message demanding Dad dance a jig around the letterbox in front of the neighbours. Dad refuses, but when the fairies freeze Bingo like a statue, he tells her not to worry - he would do anything for her. His merry jig finally pleases the fairies, unfreezes Bingo and saves the day.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Playing a game of ‘Work’, Dad hires cheeky Bluey and frog Bingo for his drainpipe factory. Bluey soon causes trouble, taking every chance to slack off. But rather than be reprimanded, she promotes herself to be Dad’s new boss! Bluey proves a stern taskmaster, having Dad lick the floor and even polish the window with his bottom! When Bingo makes Dad break the ‘No Dancing’ rule, he is fired. Seeing Dad sitting unhappily outside, the ribbiting Bingo encourages him to dance his troubles away and he impresses Mum’s passing ballerina, who finds him a new career as a professional dancer.

programme.title: Stan Can
programme.desc: Stan gives the local children a tour of the museum, which inspires them all to make their own interactive exhibition about their town and all the characters that live there.

programme.title: Tinpo
programme.desc: The high point of a window cleaners career could be a low point, if Team Tinpo cant help him with his fear of heights.

programme.title: Graces Amazing Machines
programme.desc: Motorcycle rider Grace shows off three amazing machines that all help us build things!

programme.title: Gigglebiz
programme.desc: Captain Adorable is on hand with another top tip for his new trainee Awesome Girl - this time he shows her some very silly ways to hide.

programme.title: Swashbuckle
programme.desc: Captain HeyHos finger is twitching and this can only mean one thing - a storms acoming. Its up to Cook and Line to do all they can to prepare for the storm.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The squirrels see a rainbow for the very first time, but it disappears so quickly. Together, they decide to create a rainbow themselves from everything around them.

programme.title: Dog Squad
programme.desc: Guide dog Kika and her owner Dr Amit are off to the Sticks n Stuff shop with Amits friend Alana, who is also blind, to help her buy a new white cane.

programme.title: Dog Squad
programme.desc: Kika and Dr Amit visit the library to borrow a braille book for Amit’s children.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Lucky’s Dad, Lucky and Chucky have come over to the Heelers’ house to watch a rugby final together.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.sub-title: Bumpy and the Wise Old Wolfhound
programme.desc: Facing an overnight stay in the hospital, Bingo is upset that she can’t go home. But her spirits are lifted when Mum shows her a video on her tablet sent by Dad and Bluey. In a ramshackle film shoot of friends, relatives and neighbours, Bluey spins the tale of a young girl on a quest to help heal her poor sick puppy named Bumpy. Her journey leads her across the lands to a wise old wolfhound (played by Aunt Trixie) who opens her eyes to a simple truth - everyone gets sick sometimes and it’s just a part of life. As Bumpy is healed with time and love, everyone takes a bow for a delighted Bingo.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Dad is the king of trampoline games and the girls can’t get enough. But when it’s time for Dad to go to work, Bluey and Bingo can’t bear to see him go. Insisting he can’t leave without a proper meal, they make him play the breakfast game - bounce-cooking Bingo and Bluey as toast, eggs and even a disgusting smoothie. But all good things must end, and as an emotional Bluey says goodbye, Dad charges her with a job of her own; making up her own new games. She accepts the challenge and with the help of a garden sprinkler transforms the trampoline into a salad spinner for a delighted Bingo and Mum.

programme.title: Stan Can
programme.desc: Meet Stanley, the can-do hamster whos always happy to help whenever a job needs doing. No challenge is too small or too unusual and hes always happy to lend a hand to this close, community of furry friends.

programme.desc: Its the teams favourite night of the week... movie night! But then the Pizza Delivery Blocker gets in their way!

programme.title: Graces Amazing Machines
