programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo spy on two mysterious tradies working in the backyard.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Its Blueys first trip to the cinema, but shes worried the movie will be too scary. When Bingo starts running amok in the theatre, she must conquer her fear and help Dad out.

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Broccoli is horrified when someone paints moustaches on photographs of her friends!

programme.title: JoJo and Gran Gran
programme.sub-title: Its time to go on holiday
programme.desc: JoJo and Gran Gran are watering Cynthias flowers while shes away on holiday. JoJo would like to go on holiday too, so JoJo and Gran Gran have a stay-at-home holiday in the park!

programme.title: Stan Can
programme.desc: Stanley helps Little Woo fly his kite, while Hattie is roasting some corn on her wind powered roaster. The kite gets stuck in a tree and needs fixing. Everyones happy when Stanley fixes it, but then it gets stuck again… in the roasters wind turbine. Oh no, the corn isnt ready yet!

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say ‘scooter’, and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of different scooters – a purple scooter, a blue scooter and a bopping scooter. There’s a new scooter, a toot your hooter scooter and a family on scooters. We even see Dee and Monkey enjoy a ride on racing scooters. The journey is repeated with some special surprises along the way, and everyone has a boogie when Dee’s friend finally succeeds in saying today’s word!

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say book, and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of different books and explore how they look and feel. We see a flip book, a flap book and Dee helps make a scrapbook. We see a gold book, a fluffy book and even meet a child dressed as a book! The journey is repeated with some special surprises along the way, and everyone has a boogie when Dees friend finally succeeds in saying todays word.

programme.title: Dog Squad
programme.desc: Newfoundland Sylvie is a big therapy dog with big soft cuddles who loves to help people when theyre worried. She and her owner, Katrina, visit all sorts of people every day, young and old. Today Sylvie and Katrina are visiting a doctors surgery to help a little boy called Ben. Ben has fallen off his scooter and grazed his knee, and his mum says hes too nervous to come into the doctors room. Sylvies mission is to help Ben feel brave enough to see Dr Stevens. First, she gives Ben one of her biggest and best cuddles. Then, she and Dr Stevens show Ben how a doctor treats a patient. Sylvie loves performing in the starring role. Ben finally feels brave enough to go into the doctors room with his mum. But when Ben gets frightened and runs from the room, Sylvie must use all her superpowers to help him be braver still.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Lucky’s Dad, Lucky and Chucky have come over to the Heelers’ house to watch a rugby final together.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When Dad brings a pair of tenacious tickle crabs home from the beach, no where in the house is safe! His only hope of escaping their tickles is with help from his true love.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When Mum and Dad describe a made-up world where they can relax without the girls, Bluey and Bingo decide to burst into their fantasy and chase them down. How will Mum and Dad escape?

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: During a game of bus, passenger Mum is too scared to tell Bus Driver Dad that she secretly loves him, until she gets some help from the Grannies.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The Squirrels are helping Duggee clean up when they find an old lamp. Duggee explains that in old stories, if you rub the lamp three times it can grant three magical wishes.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books
programme.desc: Pug and Dog arrive at the circus, where they meet the Great Splendina. She believes that she cannot swing from the trapeze but she rescues Dog from a fall and helps Pug complete his walk on the tightrope.

programme.title: Stan Can
programme.desc: Stan is driving Cynthias train while shes on a training course. He has 3 deliveries to make but things go a bit wrong when the brake breaks and Stan has to find a way to stop the train.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of Nelly and Nora! Two young sisters who spend their holidays in a mobile home by the sea. Its spring! But the sheep cant take off their hot winter jumpers.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora
programme.desc: Nelly and Nora try to make the cows stand up, so Dad wont think its going to rain.

programme.title: JoJo and Gran Gran
programme.desc: JoJo meets Ezras grandson Jaxon, and they join Jared, Cynthia, Ezra and Terrence for a football match in the park, with Gran Gran as the referee.

programme.title: JoJo and Gran Gran
programme.sub-title: Its time to see the moon
programme.desc: JoJo wonders why the moon is a funny shape. Gran Gran explains why the moon appears to change shape in the night sky, and together they make a moon diary for JoJo to take home.

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Supertato is due to receive the Best Hero Award, but Evil Pea decides she should get it. Carrot tells her she needs to defeat herself to win the award.

programme.title: Tinpo
programme.desc: When one Twin Po wants their bedroom to be bright and the other Twin Po likes it dark, Team Tinpo needs to find a way for them to not see the light.

programme.title: Tinpo
programme.desc: The Team help two hipster Po to see the stars.

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say ‘toothbrush’, and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see a red toothbrush, a blue toothbrush, a new toothbrush, a fuzzy toothbrush and even a giant toothbrush! Dee and a friend have fun brushing their teeth, and there’s even a toothbrush in a rush! The journey is repeated with some special surprises along the way, and everyone has a boogie when Dee’s friend finally succeeds in saying today’s word!

programme.title: Ranger Hamzas Eco Quest
programme.desc: Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers discover how beetles play an important role in the environment. They find out that beetles do so many amazing jobs, like pollinating plants and eating and recycling the nutrients in things like dead wood. They also find out that they are an important part of the food chain and that some beetles are predators who help keep pests under control. On the way, they spin like whirligig beetles and search for dung beetles in cow pats!

programme.title: Garden Tales
programme.desc: Its harvest time. Maisie the Grey Squirrel has heard the apricots in the greenhouse are particularly delicious but Victor the Rook reckons theyre off limits.

programme.title: Teeny Tiny Creatures
programme.desc: Chantelle and her friends try to spot some little owls, whilst Rory meets a bird expert.

programme.title: Dog Squad
programme.desc: Therapy dog Toffee and his owner Helen are visiting a lady called Anita, who lives on her own, to keep her company and to listen to all her amazing stories.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The Squirrels notice that Happy isnt his normal self. They learn to detect their emotions with help from Duggee and figure out what caused Happys unusual feelings.

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Chilli decides to become a superhero called Super Chilli. His superhero skills are put to the test when Evil Pea covers Supertato in sticky honey, but Chillis heat saves the day.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When Bluey, Bingo and their young friend Missy turn the hammock swing at the playground into a pirate ship, Mum narrates as Dad whips up a wild storm. But it all proves too much for Missy who gets scared and abandons ship. Mum can’t persuade Missy to conquer her fears and re-join them, especially when Bluey and Bingo are swallowed by a big blue Daddy whale. But when Missy has an idea to save her friends in the whale’s stomach, she digs deep, finds her courage and jumps on board, ready to tickle the beast and free her shipmates. And Dad obliges and spits them all up, ready for more adventures.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo love a good game of ‘Grannies’, hobbling about on canes and causing mischief. But when Bingo does the floss dance, Bluey insists that it’s definitely not something Grannies do. Unable to agree, they video call Nana who gives it her best shot. But she just can’t do it. Bluey revels in her victory a little too much, and a sad Bingo quits their game. When Mum tells Bluey, she has to choose between being right or keeping Bingo happy, Bluey finds a third option - teaching Nana how to floss! Under Bluey’s instruction, Nana becomes a flossing expert and Bingo is soon back in the game.

programme.desc: JoJo meets Ezras grandson Jaxon, and they join Jared, Cynthia, Ezra and Terrence for a football match in the park, with Gran Gran as the referee.

programme.title: JoJo and Gran Gran
programme.sub-title: Its time to see the moon
programme.desc: JoJo wonders why the moon is a funny shape. Gran Gran explains why the moon appears to change shape in the night sky, and together they make a moon diary for JoJo to take home.

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Supertato is due to receive the Best Hero Award, but Evil Pea decides she should get it. Carrot tells her she needs to defeat herself to win the award.

programme.title: Tinpo
programme.desc: When one Twin Po wants their bedroom to be bright and the other Twin Po likes it dark, Team Tinpo needs to find a way for them to not see the light.

programme.title: Tinpo
programme.desc: The Team help two hipster Po to see the stars.

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say ‘toothbrush’, and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see a red toothbrush, a blue toothbrush, a new toothbrush, a fuzzy toothbrush and even a giant toothbrush! Dee and a friend have fun brushing their teeth, and there’s even a toothbrush in a rush! The journey is repeated with some special surprises along the way, and everyone has a boogie when Dee’s friend finally succeeds in saying today’s word!

programme.title: Ranger Hamzas Eco Quest
programme.desc: Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers discover how beetles play an important role in the environment. They find out that beetles do so many amazing jobs, like pollinating plants and eating and recycling the nutrients in things like dead wood. They also find out that they are an important part of the food chain and that some beetles are predators who help keep pests under control. On the way, they spin like whirligig beetles and search for dung beetles in cow pats!

programme.title: Garden Tales
programme.desc: Its harvest time. Maisie the Grey Squirrel has heard the apricots in the greenhouse are particularly delicious but Victor the Rook reckons theyre off limits.

programme.title: Teeny Tiny Creatures
programme.desc: Chantelle and her friends try to spot some little owls, whilst Rory meets a bird expert.

programme.title: Dog Squad
programme.desc: Therapy dog Toffee and his owner Helen are visiting a lady called Anita, who lives on her own, to keep her company and to listen to all her amazing stories.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The Squirrels notice that Happy isnt his normal self. They learn to detect their emotions with help from Duggee and figure out what caused Happys unusual feelings.

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Chilli decides to become a superhero called Super Chilli. His superhero skills are put to the test when Evil Pea covers Supertato in sticky honey, but Chillis heat saves the day.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When Bluey, Bingo and their young friend Missy turn the hammock swing at the playground into a pirate ship, Mum narrates as Dad whips up a wild storm. But it all proves too much for Missy who gets scared and abandons ship. Mum can’t persuade Missy to conquer her fears and re-join them, especially when Bluey and Bingo are swallowed by a big blue Daddy whale. But when Missy has an idea to save her friends in the whale’s stomach, she digs deep, finds her courage and jumps on board, ready to tickle the beast and free her shipmates. And Dad obliges and spits them all up, ready for more adventures.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo love a good game of ‘Grannies’, hobbling about on canes and causing mischief. But when Bingo does the floss dance, Bluey insists that it’s definitely not something Grannies do. Unable to agree, they video call Nana who gives it her best shot. But she just can’t do it. Bluey revels in her victory a little too much, and a sad Bingo quits their game. When Mum tells Bluey, she has to choose between being right or keeping Bingo happy, Bluey finds a third option - teaching Nana how to floss! Under Bluey’s instruction, Nana becomes a flossing expert and Bingo is soon back in the game.

programme.title: Andys Aquatic Adventures
programme.desc: When a waved albatross snatches Mr Hammonds pocket bird guide book from Jen, its up to Andy to find it and bring it home.

programme.title: Ranger Hamzas Eco Quest
programme.desc: Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers discover how soil plays an important role in the environment. They find out that plants, trees and food crops all grow in soil.

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Supertato is due to receive the Best Hero Award, but Evil Pea decides she should get it. Carrot tells her she needs to defeat herself to win the award.

programme.title: Dog Squad
programme.desc: Guide dog Kika and her owner Dr Amit are off to the Sticks n Stuff shop with Amits friend Alana, who is also blind, to help her buy a new white cane.

programme.title: Dog Squad
programme.desc: Kika and Dr Amit visit the library to borrow a braille book for Amit’s children.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Lucky’s Dad, Lucky and Chucky have come over to the Heelers’ house to watch a rugby final together.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.sub-title: Bumpy and the Wise Old Wolfhound
programme.desc: Facing an overnight stay in the hospital, Bingo is upset that she can’t go home. But her spirits are lifted when Mum shows her a video on her tablet sent by Dad and Bluey. In a ramshackle film shoot of friends, relatives and neighbours, Bluey spins the tale of a young girl on a quest to help heal her poor sick puppy named Bumpy. Her journey leads her across the lands to a wise old wolfhound (played by Aunt Trixie) who opens her eyes to a simple truth - everyone gets sick sometimes and it’s just a part of life. As Bumpy is healed with time and love, everyone takes a bow for a delighted Bingo.

programme.title: Stan Can
programme.desc: Meet Stanley, the can-do hamster whos always happy to help whenever a job needs doing. No challenge is too small or too unusual and hes always happy to lend a hand to this close, community of furry friends.

programme.title: Graces Amazing Machines
programme.desc: Motorcycle rider Grace shows off three amazing machines that all go downhill! Grace races down a hill on a street luge, then shows up on a cool snow bike before getting to grips with a gravity bike!

programme.desc: The Lost Pirate finds himself marooned on a desert island that looks a bit like a sandpit. Keith Fitt makes another world record attempt.

programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo spy on two mysterious tradies working in the backyard.

programme.title: Stan Can
programme.desc: Stanley helps Little Woo fly his kite, while Hattie is roasting some corn on her wind powered roaster. The kite gets stuck in a tree and needs fixing. Everyones happy when Stanley fixes it, but then it gets stuck again… in the roasters wind turbine. Oh no, the corn isnt ready yet!

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say ‘scooter’, and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of different scooters – a purple scooter, a blue scooter and a bopping scooter. The journey is repeated with some special surprises along the way, and everyone has a boogie when Dee’s friend finally succeeds in saying today’s word!

The journey is repeated with some special surprises along the way, and everyone has a boogie when Dees friend finally succeeds in saying todays word.

programme.title: Dog Squad
programme.desc: Newfoundland Sylvie is a big therapy dog with big soft cuddles who loves to help people when theyre worried. She and her owner, Katrina, visit all sorts of people every day, young and old. Today Sylvie and Katrina are visiting a doctors surgery to help a little boy called Ben. Ben has fallen off his scooter and grazed his knee, and his mum says hes too nervous to come into the doctors room. Sylvies mission is to help Ben feel brave enough to see Dr Stevens. First, she gives Ben one of her biggest and best cuddles. Then, she and Dr Stevens show Ben how a doctor treats a patient. Sylvie loves performing in the starring role. Ben finally feels brave enough to go into the doctors room with his mum. But when Ben gets frightened and runs from the room, Sylvie must use all her superpowers to help him be braver still.

programme.desc: Help the Spot Bots complete the Zooples and get super switched on. Today, Cubi and Lexi try to spot some jumping fish called Ziddlers.

programme.title: Nina and the Neurons: Brilliant Bodies

programme.desc: Larry is cooking steamed tofu, egg and prawn. China is famous for its wonderful food so Larrys friends are very excited to come over for his Chinese themed meal.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: On a car trip to the dump, Dad convinces Bluey that he knows absolutely everything and is the best dad in the world. And when Bluey challenges him, asking difficult questions, Dad’s got all the right answers. But when they get to the dump and Bluey sees Dad throwing away some of her old drawings, she realises he may not be right about everything after all. Dad does his best to apologise, explaining that he’s actually not perfect and that he was recycling the paper for other kids to use for their drawings. This makes sense to Bluey who accepts his flaws and forgives him.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Blueys backyard zoo is home to wonderful animals, especially the big blue Daddy Gorilla. But when he grabs visitor Bingo and escapes, Zookeeper Bluey must recapture the wild beast.

programme.desc: Its Hatties giant raspberry pie day and the towns excited, but Myrtle wants to ensure everything is perfect. So Cynthias filthy bus wont do at all. programme.title: Dog Squad
programme.desc: Kika is a golden Labrador and a guide dog for her owner, Dr Amit, who is blind, which means he cannot see. She is trained to use her supersight to help Dr Amit do as many things as he can by himself. Together, they make the best team! Dr Amit and Kika have an important mission to pick up a surprise cake and some party hats from the supermarket for Aunty Ninas birthday. Kika has lots of friends at the supermarket. But first, she must use her supersight - and the help of her tiny friends, the road cones - to guide Dr Amit past the roadworks and keep him safely on the pavement. Then she has to help Dr Amit pick up the cake from the supermarket bakery and find the party hats. But the party hats have been moved! Kika must use all her powers to find them. Just wait until the rest of Dog Squad hear about this!

programme.desc: While Mum and Dad struggle to build new flat-pack furniture, Bluey and Bingo transform the empty boxes into their own new world.

programme.desc: Its Hatties giant raspberry pie day and the towns excited, but Myrtle wants to ensure everything is perfect. So Cynthias filthy bus wont do at all. Stanley happily cleans it with his special cleaning equipment, but the bus just gets muddy again. When finally, the bubbles start taking over the whole town. Will the raspberry pie day be ruined?!

programme.title: Tinpo
programme.desc: A Po has a dream to open a shop... but her spot on a popular walking trail is all wrong.

programme.title: Graces Amazing Machines
programme.desc: Motorcycle rider Grace shows off three amazing machines that work in docks!

programme.title: Gigglebiz
programme.desc: DIY enthusiast DIY Dan builds a birdbath for the garden birds. Arthur Sleep keeps getting distracted whilst trying to give a very important piece of news.

programme.title: Swashbuckle
programme.desc: Cook and Line trick Captain HeyHo into thinking they can see into the future with the help of some mystic pebbles theyve found on the beach.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The squirrels are out having a picnic and notice that the chickens eat a lot differently than they do. Luckily, Duggee has his eating badge and can explain all the different ways animals eat.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Muffin is playing Grouchy Granny at a garage sale, making Dad push her on an old mobility scooter, but when a real Grouchy Granny wants to buy it, Muffin wont budge.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When Muffin is told that she is special by her dad, she interprets it as an excuse to do anything she wants, which means playing Bluey and Bingos game of library her way.

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Evil Pea plans to freeze Supertato into an ice cube by pretending to teach him to dance.

programme.title: JoJo and Gran Gran
programme.desc: After going strawberry picking at the strawberry farm, JoJo and Gran Gran have lots of strawberries left over. So they decide to make delicious jam to preserve the berries for longer.

programme.title: Stan Can
programme.desc: The school are creating a dinosaur to put on display at the museum. Sophie is the dinosaur expert so knows exactly what to do, but when the spectacular dinosaur is finished its too big to move. Stanley has an idea!

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say ‘pizza’, and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of pizza – a round pizza, a tomato pizza, a party pizza and a cheesy pizza! There’s also a banana pizza, and Dee plays a game of ping pong with a pizza! The journey is repeated with some special surprises along the way, and everyone has a boogie when Dee’s friend finally succeeds in saying today’s word!

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Evil Pea tricks Supertato, and the Veggies, who fall into the Deli Counter and come face-to-face with the Turnip of Terror. They escape with help from the not so scary Turnip.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bored of the overcrowded local playground, Dad leads Bluey, Bingo and Mackenzie on an adventure to discover their local creek. Cast out of her comfort zone, Bluey finds the weird bugs and untamed landscape intimidating at first. But as the natural wonder of the bush enchants her, she finds her resilience and inner strength with each passing step. By the time they reach the picturesque watering hole, Bluey is enraptured with the simple natural beauty that surrounds her. And after a well-deserved dip they return to civilization, with Bluey more confident than ever before.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: After Dad ignores Bingo, trouble comes to the Heelers house, which fills up with invisible mischief-making fairies. Tails are braided, Mum gets a peg beard and Dad’s phone ends up in fairy dancing circle! Mum suspects someone hurt the fairies’ feelings and sends Bingo to see what they want. Bingo leads the family to a message demanding Dad dance a jig around the letterbox in front of the neighbours. Dad refuses, but when the fairies freeze Bingo like a statue, he tells her not to worry - he would do anything for her. His merry jig finally pleases the fairies, unfreezes Bingo and saves the day.

programme.title: JoJo and Gran Gran
programme.sub-title: Its Time for a Woodland Walk
programme.desc: When JoJo and Gran Gran find a sycamore tree, they decide to take a woodland walk. With JoJos Nature Tick Book, they go on a search for all the different trees they can find!

programme.title: JoJo and Gran Gran
programme.sub-title: Its Time to See the Planets
programme.desc: Captain Chloes adventures through space inspire JoJo and Gran Gran, who make a visit to the space centre to see the planets.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora
programme.desc: In the winter forest, Nelly and Nora discover a little tree that thinks Spring has come.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora
programme.desc: Nora wants to find the perfect place to grow her little plant.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When Indy and Rusty play Mum and Dads, they can’t agree on who should go to work, so they part company. Indy has a hard time finding a babysitter, while Bluey makes Rusty her baby!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When Muffin cant stop sucking her thumb, she has to wear a cone of shame. But the cone gets in her way and she can no longer play sandwich shop with Bluey and Bingo.

programme.title: Tinpo
programme.desc: When some flowers pop-up near Tinpo HQ, there are too many for Logi-Po to water!

programme.title: Tinpo
programme.desc: Tinpo and his problem-solving crew help Delivery Po transport her delicate cargo down a bumpy road.

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say ‘moon’, and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We learn all about the moon. There’s a white moon, full moon and crescent moon. Twinkly moons, rockets flying to the moon and even a cow jumping over the moon! The journey is repeated with some special surprises along the way, and everyone has a boogie when Dee’s friend finally succeeds in saying today’s word.

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say ‘star’, and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of stars – a yellow star, a bright one, a pointy star and a jingle star. We see Dee and a friend sprinkle stars, and Dee wishes on a shooting star! The journey is repeated with some special surprises along the way, and everyone has a boogie when Dee’s friend finally succeeds in saying today’s word!

programme.title: Dog Squad
programme.desc: Its Mums birthday and Rayane is baking a cake, painting a teapot and borrowing some bunting from Sally next door for an extra special secret birthday surprise.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books
programme.desc: Dog and Pug arrive on a desert island and find a pirate who has lost his treasure. They help the pir

programme.title: Dog Loves Books
programme.desc: The lights in the shop go out and Dog and Pug share an adventure seeing all the nocturnal activities around them - bats, cats and foxes. Finally they see the night workers who are repairing the problem.

programme.title: Stan Can
programme.desc: Amare asks Stanley to help her on the farm. Stanley asks Little Woo, Fred and Fifi to join him in sowing seeds, watering plants and picking apples, all whilst having fun.

programme.title: Stan Can
programme.desc: Fifi and Fred discover some old stones while digging. Stanley is called to help dig further, and they soon discover it’s the remains of an old mosaic. After putting all the puzzle pieces together they discover its a beautiful ancient hamster image. With Hetties help, Stanley carefully transports it to the museum.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The Squirrels are helping Duggee clean up when they find an old lamp. Duggee explains that in old stories, if you rub the lamp three times it can grant three magical wishes.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bingo finds a toy turtle at the playground and wants to take him home, but Dad says its not the done thing.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When Mums sister Brandy comes over for a visit, she brings the kids onesies as a present, which has an unexpected effect on Bingo!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Dad tries to teach Bluey how to play chess, but Mum thinks she is still too young. When Bingo joins in, the kids make up their own rules, but they still cant beat Dad.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When a heavy summer rain thunders over the Heeler home, Bluey is determined to dam the water in the front yard, while Mum tries to stop her constantly tracking mud into the house.

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Evil Pea plans to freeze Supertato into an ice cube by pretending to teach him to dance.

programme.title: JoJo and Gran Gran
programme.desc: After going strawberry picking at the strawberry farm, JoJo and Gran Gran have lots of strawberries left over. So they decide to make delicious jam to preserve the berries for longer.

programme.title: Stan Can
programme.desc: The school are creating a dinosaur to put on display at the museum. Sophie is the dinosaur expert so knows exactly what to do, but when the spectacular dinosaur is finished its too big to move. Stanley has an idea!

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say ‘pizza’, and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of pizza – a round pizza, a tomato pizza, a party pizza and a cheesy pizza! There’s also a banana pizza, and Dee plays a game of ping pong with a pizza! The journey is repeated with some special surprises along the way, and everyone has a boogie when Dee’s friend finally succeeds in saying today’s word!

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say boots, and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of different boots and explore how they look and feel. We see blue boots, new boots, welly boots and even smelly boots! There are boots to wear in a puddle and boots to wear when you cuddle. The journey is repeated with some special surprises along the way, and everyone has a boogie when Dees friend finally succeeds in saying todays word.

programme.title: Dog Squad
programme.desc: Kika is a golden Labrador and a guide dog for her owner, Dr Amit, who is blind, which means he cannot see. She is trained to use her supersight to help Dr Amit do as many things as he can by himself. Together, they make the best team! Dr Amit and Kika have an important mission to pick up a surprise cake and some party hats from the supermarket for Aunty Ninas birthday. Kika has lots of friends at the supermarket. But first, she must use her supersight - and the help of her tiny friends, the road cones - to guide Dr Amit past the roadworks and keep him safely on the pavement. Then she has to help Dr Amit pick up the cake from the supermarket bakery and find the party hats. But the party hats have been moved! Kika must use all her powers to find them. Just wait until the rest of Dog Squad hear about this!

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: Germany has long been considered a leader in renewable energy - a model even for others to follow with its subsidies for wind and solar. Householders were encouraged to put solar panels on their rooves as early as two decades ago.

В каждом из выпусков «Жить здорово!» — четыре рубрики: «Про жизнь», «Про еду», «Про медицину» и «Про дом». Ведущие программы расскажут не только о том, чем мы болеем и как нужно лечиться.

programme.title: Человек и закон
programme.desc: Общественно-политическая программа «Человек и закон» выходит на главном телеканале страны уже 32 года. programme.title: Gomorra: La Serie

A Ciro, braccio destro di Pietro, il compito di aiutarlo. Regia di S. Sollima.

programme.title: Gomorra: La Serie

programme.title: Sex Pod: Quanto ne sai sul sesso?
programme.desc: Il sex pod e un luogo dove ragazzi e ragazze si liberano da ogni tabu e svelano tutto quello che sanno sul sesso. Non solo, hanno anche la possibilita di porre a esperti, come medici e sessuologi, domande su qualsiasi aspetto riguardi la sfera sessuale. Per approfondire cosi le proprie conoscenze superficiali, scoprire, anche grazie allaiuto di video dimostrativi, cose di cui non sapevano nulla, e chiarire dubbi e perplessita.

programme.desc: Headquartered live on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) where the biggest companies in the world trade, “Squawk On The Street” tracks the action of every stock and gives you access to the treasury, currency and commodity action in real time. The show also covers the final hour of European trading, providing investors with actionable insight on the best course of action to take in U.S. based markets.

programme.title: Twin Turbos
programme.desc: Its all hands on deck as the Deberti crew races to complete the 2018 Mustang build. And, at the SEMA show a chance encounter could jumpstart Brads race career.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike attempts to double his money by turning an old Frogeye Sprite into a premiership quality classic car to be test driven around the Brooklands Motor Museum.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers
programme.desc: Sculptor Nick Elphick is tasked with recreating the missing parts of a vintage deer skeleton. Furniture restorer Steve Norman rebuilds a rosewood sofa.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike wants a high performance car with an historic badge, but its hard to find a Saab 9-3 Turbo at a good price. With tight margins will Edd have any room for manoeuvre?

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Part one of two. Mike Brewer purchases a Toyota MR2 in need of Edd Chinas expertise, and the mechanic soon gets to work overhauling the cars bodywork.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Whilst Edd China is busy in his workshop working on the car, Mike Brewer heads to a specialised company to get some refurbished wheels for the MRII.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.sub-title: Time-Delay Locks, Brownies, Pallet Dispensers, and Crystal Chandeliers
programme.desc: How are time-delay locks, brownies, pallet dispensers, and crystal chandeliers made?

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: In a highly mechanised world, the host explores how ordinary objects are created and sheds light on the vision of geniuses and industrial designers who strive to make things better.

programme.title: Shed And Buried
programme.desc: Henry and Fuzz rummage through Rebecca and Sues sheds near Newark. Theyve got literally shedloads of gearboxes, cars and motorbikes, so what kind of a challenge will Henry and Fuzz bring back for restorers Guy and Allen?

programme.title: Shed And Buried
programme.desc: In Bournemouth, Henry and Fuzz look through Maxs vast automobilia collection. Whilst some are fully restored, others need fixing up. What will they come away with?

programme.title: Scrappers
programme.desc: Meet the colourful characters that work in Polands scrap metal industry. Plus, a behind the scenes view of where the materials come from and where they go after the scrapyard.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: Classic Cars
programme.sub-title: Ford Fiesta Supersport And Lotus Elise
programme.desc: The guys travel to Dundee, Scotland, to view a Lotus Elise S1. Drew is furious at numerous modifications made to the car, including stickers and a wing.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike wants a classic Jensen Interceptor. New, the car costs as much as a house, so if he does find one for his £5000, Ed might struggle to make it roadworthy.

programme.title: Gold Rush: Freddy Dodges Mine Rescue
programme.desc: Expert gold miner Freddy Dodge helps struggling mine owners. If he can increase the owners gold haul, he gets a cut of the profits but nothing if he fails.

programme.title: Gold Rush: Freddy Dodges Mine Rescue
programme.desc: A young prodigy, his father and grandfather battle wintry weather in central Alaska. Plus, Freddy and Juan race to complete fixes before a snowstorm hits.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters

programme.title: Batwoman
programme.desc: Batwoman affronta una nuova sfida quando a Gotham i tossicodipendenti da Snakebite diventano affamati di dosi sempre maggiori.

programme.desc: Il capitano del RIS e sempre piu in crisi: vari casi di violenza carnale gli ricordano la storia di Anna e il principale sospettato muore per un malore.

programme.title: Show reel
programme.desc: SHOW REEL 25

programme.title: Prodigal Son
programme.desc: Dopo una catastrofica serie di eventi, Malcolm e Ainsley si convincono che Nicholas Endicott nasconda qualche segreto.

programme.title: Prodigal Son
programme.desc: Mentre il mistero della ragazza nella scatola viene a galla, Malcolm continua a indagare su se stesso.

programme.title: Show reel
programme.desc: SHOW REEL 25

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: Magnum deve aiutare la sua fidanzata avvocato Abby quando capisce che il cliente che ha difeso con successo da unaccusa di omicidio, in realta e colpevole.

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: Mentre Magnum aiuta il suo amico Russell Harlan (la guest star Lee Majors) sostituendolo come capo della sicurezza di un albergo, deve indagare sulla morte di una delle ospiti, che e stata gettata dal balcone della sua stanza, mentre lavorava a una sua indagine giornalistica. Nel frattempo, Icepick (la guest star Corbin Bernsen) viene rilasciato dalla prigione e cerca di nascondere qualcosa a Rick.

programme.title: Chuck
programme.desc: LIntersect sta cambiando Morgan molto velocemente. Chuck e gli altri scoprono che ha deciso di lavorare per la loro piu grande rivale, la Verbanski Corporation.

programme.title: Chuck
programme.desc: La Beckman estrae lIntersect difettoso dal cervello di Morgan e ne informa la Cia: lordine di ucciderlo viene revocato, ma uno dei sicari incaricati da Decker e un collaboratore esterno allAgenzia, che non puo essere richiamato. Il suo nome in codice e Viper. Chuck si finge Morgan alla convention dei Venditori dellAnno del Buy More a Riverside e con laiuto di Sarah, riesce a catturare quello che credono sia Viper.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Con per firmare autografi, realizza lo stand con Leonard: questultimo pero finisce per catalizzare lattenzione dei ragazzi, che si fermano a chiedergli come abbia fatto a sposare Penny.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon e Amy tornano a registrare il podcast. Amy non e stata sincera riguardo al suo appartamento e quando Sheldon lo scopre deve prendere una decisione importante.

programme.title: Arrow
programme.desc: Oliver è sorpreso dai cambiamenti allinterno del team Arrow. È abituato a gestire la situazione ma capisce che in sua assenza la squadra si è evoluta, il che porta a un aumento della tensione allinterno del covo. Oliver non vuole che Laurel rischi la vita nei panni di Black Canary, ma quando Vertigo (PETER STORMARE) fa il suo ritorno, la donna disobbedisce e rintraccia il criminale, che le inietta una grossa dose della droga. Le paure più grandi di Laurel sono collegate alla sorella Sara (CAITY LOTZ), quindi la droga le fa immaginare un epico scontro fra Canary e Black Canary. Intanto, Chase sorprende Thea e Roy le consiglia di stare lontana da Malcolm.

programme.title: Arrow
programme.desc: Malcolm mette Oliver e Thea in una situazione pericolosa quando li lascia a Lian Yu con lex nemico di Oliver, Deathstroke. Un flashback rivela quando Oliver e Maseo tornarono a Starling City per recuperare larma biologica Omega e, pur essendo sotto la sorveglianza di Amanda Waller, che ha ordinato ad Oliver di non mostrarsi a nessuno, questi cerca ugualmente la sua famiglia.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: La polizia e i vigili del fuoco della 51 sono alla ricerca di Mills e Brett. I due paramedici vengono salvati giusto in tempo. Intanto la storia tra Dawson e Casey arriva al capolinea. Il bambino di Boden e Donna, invece, sembra riprendersi completamente.

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: Magnum deve aiutare la sua fidanzata avvocato Abby quando capisce che il cliente che ha difeso con successo da unaccusa di omicidio, in realta e colpevole.

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: Mentre Magnum aiuta il suo amico Russell Harlan (la guest star Lee Majors) sostituendolo come capo della sicurezza di un albergo, deve indagare sulla morte di una delle ospiti, che e stata gettata dal balcone della sua stanza, mentre lavorava a una sua indagine giornalistica. Nel frattempo, Icepick (la guest star Corbin Bernsen) viene rilasciato dalla prigione e cerca di nascondere qualcosa a Rick.

programme.title: Chuck
programme.desc: LIntersect sta cambiando Morgan molto velocemente. Chuck e gli altri scoprono che ha deciso di lavorare per la loro piu grande rivale, la Verbanski Corporation.

programme.title: Chuck
programme.desc: La Beckman estrae lIntersect difettoso dal cervello di Morgan e ne informa la Cia: lordine di ucciderlo viene revocato, ma uno dei sicari incaricati da Decker e un collaboratore esterno allAgenzia, che non puo essere richiamato. Il suo nome in codice e Viper. Chuck si finge Morgan alla convention dei Venditori dellAnno del Buy More a Riverside e con laiuto di Sarah, riesce a catturare quello che credono sia Viper.

programme.title: Arrow
programme.desc: Oliver è sorpreso dai cambiamenti allinterno del team Arrow. È abituato a gestire la situazione ma capisce che in sua assenza la squadra si è evoluta, il che porta a un aumento della tensione allinterno del covo. Oliver non vuole che Laurel rischi la vita nei panni di Black Canary, ma quando Vertigo (PETER STORMARE) fa il suo ritorno, la donna disobbedisce e rintraccia il criminale, che le inietta una grossa dose della droga. Le paure più grandi di Laurel sono collegate alla sorella Sara (CAITY LOTZ), quindi la droga le fa immaginare un epico scontro fra Canary e Black Canary. Intanto, Chase sorprende Thea e Roy le consiglia di stare lontana da Malcolm.

programme.title: Arrow
programme.desc: Malcolm mette Oliver e Thea in una situazione pericolosa quando li lascia a Lian Yu con lex nemico di Oliver, Deathstroke. Un flashback rivela quando Oliver e Maseo tornarono a Starling City per recuperare larma biologica Omega e, pur essendo sotto la sorveglianza di Amanda Waller, che ha ordinato ad Oliver di non mostrarsi a nessuno, questi cerca ugualmente la sua famiglia.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: La polizia e i vigili del fuoco della 51 sono alla ricerca di Mills e Brett. I due paramedici vengono salvati giusto in tempo. Intanto la storia tra Dawson e Casey arriva al capolinea. Il bambino di Boden e Donna, invece, sembra riprendersi completamente.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Con per firmare autografi, realizza lo stand con Leonard: questultimo pero finisce per catalizzare lattenzione dei ragazzi, che si fermano a chiedergli come abbia fatto a sposare Penny.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon e Amy tornano a registrare il podcast. Amy non e stata sincera riguardo al suo appartamento e quando Sheldon lo scopre deve prendere una decisione importante.

programme.title: Next
programme.desc: Thriller fantascientifico da un racconto di P. Dick, con Nicholas Cage. Chris puo vedere il futuro. Il Governo e sulle sue tracce perche sventi una minaccia nucleare. Regia di L. Tamahori; USA 2007

programme.title: L eliminatore
programme.desc: Arnold Schwarzenegger e un agente segreto incaricato della difesa di una preziosa testimone, che ha scoperto un traffico illecito di armi.

programme.title: Batwoman
programme.desc: Mentre la vita di Luke Fox e appesa a un filo, le ripercussioni di quanto accaduto portano a decisioni che cambieranno la vita delle persone attorno a lui. E forse questo un addio?

programme.title: Batwoman
programme.desc: Quando una nota nemica fa la sua comparsa a Gotham, Batwoman e Mary devono fidarsi piu che mai luna dellaltra. Nel frattempo Alice ha una nuova missione e si trova accanto unalleata inattesa.

programme.title: R.I.S. Delitti Imperfetti
programme.desc: Mentre Martinelli, Filippo Nigro, e Levi, Romina Mondello, indagano sul caso di una bellissima infermiera uccisa in ospedale, De Biase, Ugo Dighero, e Testi, Stefano Pesce, analizzano lorologio che luomo delle bombe ha lasciato sul parapetto prima di gettarsi: purtroppo ci sono solo le impronte di Venturi, Lorenzo Flaherty. Il capitano, sempre piu angosciato, trova nel suo ufficio il portachiavi che aveva regalato ad Anna, Nicole Grimaudo. E sicuro che il criminale sia vivo e che lo stia sfidando, ma nessuno gli crede. Anzi, Tosi, Nino DAgata, gli impone una licenza forzata.

programme.title: Show reel
programme.desc: SHOW REEL 25

programme.title: Prodigal Son
programme.desc: Nel primo episodio della seconda stagione, Bright deve fare i conti con la sua coscienza, dopo le sconcertanti azioni compiute da sua sorella nel finale della prima stagione. Ora, dovra prendersi cura di lei e dovra proteggere sua madre, Jessica, da un segreto che potrebbe di nuovo distruggere la loro famiglia. Per distrarsi, Malcolm si getta a capofitto in un nuovo caso, in cui la vittima e stata decapitata, ma lunica persona a cui puo rivolgersi per chiedere aiuto e suo padre. Nel frattempo, Martin torna a Claremont, dove scopre di dover dividere la cella con un nuovo compagno di stanza (Michael Chernus). JT, intanto, diventa oggetto di discriminazione venendo preso di mira da alcuni colleghi poliziotti.

programme.title: Prodigal Son
programme.desc: Mentre Bright e alle prese con gli effetti dei suoi traumi, un prete viene trovato assassinato nella sua chiesa. Martin, nel tentativo di aiutarlo con il caso, consulta il suo compagno di prigione, Frate Pete (Christian Borle), il quale nasconde un segreto. Nel frattempo, Ainsley teme che Jessica le stia nascondendo qualcosa riguardo alla sua relazione con Gil. Dani, Gil e Malcolm si schierano dalla parte di JT, esortandolo a parlare con il suo rappresentante sindacale riguardo i problemi di discriminazione che sta affrontando al lavoro

programme.title: Show reel
programme.desc: SHOW REEL 25

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: Magnum passa un caso allamico investigatore privato Harry Brown (guest star William Forsythe), ma quando gli sparano si sente in colpa e continua le indagini con gli indizi lasciati dalluomo. Intanto, TC e Kumu protestano contro la costruzione su un sito sacro hawaiano.

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: La nuova collaborazione tra Magnum e Higgins viene messa alla prova quando si trovano in disaccordo sullaiutare una donna a recuperare 3 milioni di dollari di soldi della droga, che le sono stati rubati, per salvare la vita del marito. Inoltre, TC e Shammy devono indagare a fondo su qualcuno che si spaccia per un veterano decorato. I vincitori del Grammy Award, i Train, eseguono la prima mondiale della loro nuova canzone: "Mai Tai" con lapparizione speciale di Skylar Grey.

programme.title: Chuck
programme.desc: Decker fa un patto con Chuck e Sarah: se loro recupereranno "Omen", un super virus informatico in grado di distruggere tutti i database del mondo, lui fara liberare Casey.

programme.title: Chuck
programme.desc: Dopo avere fatto evadere Casey ed essere stati complici delleliminazione di Decker, Chuck e la sua squadra sono ricercati dalla CIA e costretti a darsi alla fuga.

programme.desc: Dopo il successo del loro esperimento di combinazione genetica, Sheldon è convinto di voler procreare con Amy. Inoltre, il lavoro svolto dalla persona frequentata da Raj lo imbarazza.

programme.desc: Bert, del dipartimento di Geologia, viene insignito della prestigiosa borsa di studio MacArthur per i suoi studi sui microbi delle rocce, e la cosa provoca un forte senso di invidia in Sheldon.

programme.title: Batwoman
programme.desc: Batwoman continua a lottare mentre Black Mask alza la posta con Circe suo braccio destro. Nel frattempo Alice e Safiyah incrociano di nuovo le loro strade.

programme.title: Batwoman
programme.desc: Ryan Wilder mette in discussione il suo ruolo di eroina della citta e si unisce a Luke, Mary e Sophie quando Black Mask porta il caos nelle strade di Gotham.

programme.title: R.I.S. Delitti Imperfetti
programme.desc: Tosi, Nino DAgata, decide che il nuovo capitano del RIS sara Fabio Martinelli, Filippo Nigro. Giorgia, Romina Mondello, preferisce non lavorare col suo amante, Testi, Stefano Pesce, va incontro allamico risolvendo con lui il complicato caso di una setta satanica. Intanto Venturi, Lorenzo Flaherty, torna alla diga, indagando per conto suo. Convoca li la sua squadra, annunciando che luomo delle bombe non e morto e che lui ha le prove: per dimostrarlo si lancia nellacqua, proprio come aveva fatto il suo avversario.

programme.title: Show reel
programme.desc: SHOW REEL 25

programme.title: Prodigal Son
programme.desc: La puntata apre una finestra sul passato di Malcolm, riportandolo (e portandoci) ai tempi in cui era uno studente.Tutto inizia quando Malcolm (Tom Payne) e Gil (Lou Diamond Phillips) avviano le indagini su un nuovo omicidio: la vittima è il signor Brumback, preside della Remington Academy, lAlma mater di Bright. Luomo è stato rinvenuto nella piscina, legato alla sua sedia. Il suo ufficio è stato ricostruito in modo tanto inquietante quanto preciso. Un quadro macabro che porta Malcolm a convincersi che il colpevole non potrebbe essere che un allievo dellistituto. Attraverso un primo flashback, torniamo al 2005. Malcolm, in visita al padre, annuncia di voler aprire un nuovo capitolo, cambiare qualcosa, lasciarsi alle spalle il passato: cambierà il suo cognome, non vuole essere riconosciuto come il figlio del Chirurgo, dora in avanti non sarà più Malcolm Whitly, ma Malcolm Bright.Torniamo al presente. Malcolm e Gil incontrano il professor Delaney, preside ad interim e scoprono che Jessica ha assicurato al consiglio direttivo della scuola che le indagini si svolgeranno nella massima discrezione. I due rimangono sorpresi, ancor più sorpresi quando Jessica si presenta di fronte a loro, considerando anche la situazione delicata venutasi a creare tra la donna e Gil. Nel frattempo, Martin diventa sempre più complice con Pete (guest star Christian Borle) e JT comincia a capire cosa comporti limminente paternità.

programme.title: Prodigal Son
programme.sub-title: Un Giorno Al Lavoro Con Papa
programme.desc: Martin e felicissimo quando un omicidio avvenuto a Claremont porta la Polizia di New York nel suo territorio, consentendogli di essere coinvolto direttamente in uno dei casi di Malcolm. Anche Ainsley si occupa del caso di omicidio, e nel frattempo comincia a sospettare che Malcolm le stia nascondendo qualcosa. Per tutto il tempo, Malcolm e Ainsley devono evitare la madre, la quale si chiede perche si siano sbarazzati del suo tappeto preferito.

Her journey leads her across the lands to a wise old wolfhound (played by Aunt Trixie) who opens her eyes to a simple truth - everyone gets sick sometimes and it’s just a part of life. programme.title: Minnies Bow-Toons: Pet Hotel
programme.desc: Millie and Melody help Minnie and Daisy see that it’s easier to keep up with all the pets at the Pet Hotel when you’re riding a scooter — the problem is, the pets want to ride, too.

programme.title: Superkitties
programme.desc: When Bitsy accidentally clones herself with Lab Rats new invention, the team must stop the Bitsies. Zsa-Zsa steals the SuperKitty Kit, so she doesnt have to practice flying.

programme.title: Superkitties
programme.desc: Bitsy learns to say goodbye to Renata and her robin babies, when they have to fly away. The SuperKitties stop Mr. Puppypaws from cheating in the talent contest.

programme.title: Spidey and His Amazing Friends
programme.sub-title: Goblin Island / Doc Ock and the Shocktobots
programme.desc: When the team is trapped on an Island with a prank-throwing lighthouse, the team must save the day! When Doc Ock steals Vibranium, Spidey and Black Panther team up to stop her!

programme.title: Spidey and His Amazing Friends
programme.desc: When Gobby repaints the masterpieces at the museum, Miles saves the day! Spidey and Ghost-Spider take care of a cute puppy, at the same time stopping Rhinos rampage at the Mall.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo are playing "The Quiet Game" and wont use words to tell Dad which toy to buy for Muffin. At his wits end, Dad recruits new store clerk Alfie to help interpret the girls miming.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When Mum and Dad have a disagreement, Bluey makes Dad write a love letter to Mum to make up. Bluey must find a way to play Grounds Lava with Bingo and deliver the letter to Mum, without squabbling.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo are playing "The Quiet Game" and wont use words to tell Dad which toy to buy for Muffin. At his wits end, Dad recruits new store clerk Alfie to help interpret the girls miming.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When Muffin cant stop sucking her thumb, she has to wear a cone of shame. But the cone gets in her way and she can no longer play sandwich shop with Bluey and Bingo.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey is the ringmaster in a game of circus with her friends, but Hercules wants to play his motorcycle game instead. Luckily Bluey has a solution to keep everyone happy.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Mum helps Bluey and Bingo find ways to entertain themselves on a family road trip, while Dad tries to stay ahead of the grey nomad convoy or risk camping near the toilets.

programme.title: Mickey Mouse Clubhouse+

programme.title: Superkitties
programme.desc: The Kitties face their fears and enter the Super Spooky House. When the Pumpkin Ball is stolen, it’s up to the SuperKitties to get it back in time for the Halloween Party.

programme.title: Spidey and His Amazing Friends
programme.desc: Ghost-Spider teams up with her dad to save the forest from Doc Ock. Peter accidentally grows his pet ant to the size of a dog.

programme.title: Spidey and His Amazing Friends
programme.desc: Spidey and Iron Man must take back Stark Tower from Doc Ock. Hulk and Miles have to find new ways to stop Sandman after he figures out how to avoid their signature moves.

programme.title: Mickey Mouse Clubhouse+
programme.desc: Goofy’s hungry for pizza, but the fridge is missing ingredients. Mickey and pals use Mouseketools to gather what’s needed and make a delicious pizza to share!

programme.title: Minnies Bow-Toons: Pet Hotel
programme.desc: Millie and Melody help Minnie and Daisy see that it’s easier to keep up with all the pets at the Pet Hotel when you’re riding a scooter — the problem is, the pets want to ride, too.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey insists Mum and Dad relive their old backpacking days by strapping Bluey, Bingo, Muffin and Socks to their backs and going on an adventure in the garden. But with these cheeky backpacks getting up to mischief, haggling for street food and minicab rides in this strange foreign land is proving a tricky proposition. At the kids prompting, Dad eats too much and needs a bathroom fast! Guidebook in hand. Mum finds their hostel at last but the passports are lost in the bottom of their bags. They only have one option left - shake their giggling bags upside down until everything falls out!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey and Chloe turn the playground into a magical kingdom where a princess is tasked by the Kindly Queen to find food and save her people. Taking turns playing all the lead roles, the two friends journey into a world where they encounter rude terriers, grandma fairies and brave the machinations of the Greedy Queen who has frozen all her enemies! Finally finding her courage, the princess tricks the queen with a well thrown tennis ball and captures her magic wand––unfreezing the people of the kingdom and saving the day!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey’s having a fun copying everything Dad says and does, including Olympic walking, but the game takes a serious turn when she finds a hurt budgie by the side of the path. Dad and Bluey bundle it into a shoebox and head to the vet. But despite their best efforts, the budgie dies. To deal with her feelings, Bluey enlists Bingo and they re-enact her morning, racing Budgie Bingo to Mum’s vet for some emergency help. When Bingo makes a miraculous recovery, Bluey is upset that the game hasn’t gone the way she planned, but she takes solace in knowing that some things are just out of her hands.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: A sleepover with their cousin means Bluey and Bingo get to stay up late! But when Muffin shows up exhausted after missing her nap, the girls get more fun than they bargained for.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Calypso mediates as Bluey and friends accuse Rusty of ruining their game. They were playing a simple game of baby hospital. When Indy’s baby came early (just like her little sister), it needed special care and attention, requiring her mother Indy to be very brave. But Rusty ruined everything by picking the early baby up! Rusty apologies, explaining that he was playing a game of Knights and he was just trying to rescue the kings daughter, kidnapped by a ravenous dragon. As he explains the bravery of the king’s daughter, Bluey and her friends recognise how much their games have in common.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When Indy and Rusty play Mum and Dads, they can’t agree on who should go to work, so they part company. Indy has a hard time finding a babysitter, while Bluey makes Rusty her baby!

programme.title: Spidey and His Amazing Friends
programme.sub-title: Camping Conundrum/The Great Green Crime Spree
programme.desc: The Spidey Team goes camping, but Old Dam is cracking and about to flood the park. Green Goblin frames the Hulk, and Spidey and Ghosty are determined to prove hes innocent.

programme.title: Spidey and His Amazing Friends
programme.desc: Spidey, Ghost-Spider, and Miles Morales team up to become The Spidey Team! With a little help from other Avenger friends, these superheroes will work together to save the day!

programme.title: Superkitties
programme.desc: The SuperKitties must rescue Wiggles, their new dancing robo-piggy, from Zsa-Zsa before the Kittydale Dance Party. Bitsy cheers on Pickles as he learns something new.

programme.title: Pupstruction
programme.desc: Professor Frazzle keeps wrecking her lab with explosive experiments. Underwater, Pupstruction helps separate a cranky crab and his neighbor by building a wall between their houses.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: On a car trip to the dump, Dad convinces Bluey that he knows absolutely everything and is the best dad in the world. And when Bluey challenges him, asking difficult questions, Dad’s got all the right answers. But when they get to the dump and Bluey sees Dad throwing away some of her old drawings, she realises he may not be right about everything after all. Dad does his best to apologise, explaining that he’s actually not perfect and that he was recycling the paper for other kids to use for their drawings. This makes sense to Bluey who accepts his flaws and forgives him.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Blueys backyard zoo is home to wonderful animals, especially the big blue Daddy Gorilla. But when he grabs visitor Bingo and escapes, Zookeeper Bluey must recapture the wild beast.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey insists Mum and Dad relive their old backpacking days by strapping Bluey, Bingo, Muffin and Socks to their backs and going on an adventure in the garden. programme.sub-title: The Whiff of Badness / An Yus Birthday
programme.desc: Ice Cub wants to prove how amazing his polar sniffing power is. By playing a mean birthday trick, Night Ninja tries to get An Yu to destroy the museum.

programme.title: PJ Masks: Power Heroes
programme.desc: Newton wants to check out an asteroid but its a trap. Luna takes Owlettes voice, imperiling the school music concert.

programme.title: PJ Masks: Power Heroes
programme.sub-title: I Scream for Wolfies / An Yu and the Gekkos
programme.desc: Catboy encourages IceCub to mess around with his snowballs, but the Wolfies take advantage. An Yu finds it difficult to be a hero when things arent the way she is used to.

programme.title: Alices Wonderland Bakery
programme.sub-title: The Looking Glass Leap / Backwards Buttercake
programme.desc: Alice goes through the Looking Glass, where the Silver Queen helps her with a bake. With the help of Alice and the Silver Queen, Hattie masters his familys Buttercake recipe.

programme.title: Alices Wonderland Bakery
programme.desc: Alice and Fergie both say that theyll make the best potato dish, but they realize their dishes are the same! Hattie bakes an Inside-Out Cake.

programme.title: Alices Wonderland Bakery
programme.desc: When the Queen misses a crucial step in baking, Alice saves the day! The Queen and Rosa are whisked away on a trip and ask Alice to care for their pet, Jabbie.

programme.desc: Spidey, Ghost-Spider, and Miles Morales team up to become The Spidey Team! With a little help from other Avenger friends, these superheroes will work together to save the day!

programme.title: Spidey and His Amazing Friends
programme.desc: The Spidey Team takes on a rampaging dinosaur only to discover Green Goblin is at the controls. Spidey is in charge of delivering the cake to Hulk’s birthday bash!

programme.title: Mickey Mouse Funhouse
programme.desc: Goofy is concerned his dino-running partner is too slow for the Dino-Opolis 500 race. Donald gets frustrated when he cant get the moves right to a new dance.

programme.title: Mickey Mouse Funhouse
programme.sub-title: Daisys Dilemma/ The Good Luck Moon
programme.desc: Daisy has trouble choosing between Mickey and Minnies jack-o-lanterns for a Halloween competition. When celebrating Chuseok, Ye Eun forgets to make an important dish.

programme.title: Mickey Mouse Funhouse
programme.sub-title: The Giant And The Goof/ Call Me Cora!
programme.desc: When Goofy and Willie the giant switch sizes, Chickie Boo Boo goes missing and causes chaos. Mortimer gives everyone nicknames, but Cora the crab doesnt like being called Crabby.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bored of the overcrowded local playground, Dad leads Bluey, Bingo and Mackenzie on an adventure to discover their local creek. Cast out of her comfort zone, Bluey finds the weird bugs and untamed landscape intimidating at first. But as the natural wonder of the bush enchants her, she finds her resilience and inner strength with each passing step. By the time they reach the picturesque watering hole, Bluey is enraptured with the simple natural beauty that surrounds her. And after a well-deserved dip they return to civilization, with Bluey more confident than ever before.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: After Dad ignores Bingo, trouble comes to the Heelers house, which fills up with invisible mischief-making fairies. Tails are braided, Mum gets a peg beard and Dad’s phone ends up in fairy dancing circle! Mum suspects someone hurt the fairies’ feelings and sends Bingo to see what they want. Bingo leads the family to a message demanding Dad dance a jig around the letterbox in front of the neighbours. Dad refuses, but when the fairies freeze Bingo like a statue, he tells her not to worry - he would do anything for her. His merry jig finally pleases the fairies, unfreezes Bingo and saves the day.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Playing a game of ‘Work’, Dad hires cheeky Bluey and frog Bingo for his drainpipe factory. Bluey soon causes trouble, taking every chance to slack off. But rather than be reprimanded, she promotes herself to be Dad’s new boss! Bluey proves a stern taskmaster, having Dad lick the floor and even polish the window with his bottom! When Bingo makes Dad break the ‘No Dancing’ rule, he is fired. Seeing Dad sitting unhappily outside, the ribbiting Bingo encourages him to dance his troubles away and he impresses Mum’s passing ballerina, who finds him a new career as a professional dancer.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.sub-title: Bumpy and the Wise Old Wolfhound
programme.desc: Facing an overnight stay in the hospital, Bingo is upset that she can’t go home. But her spirits are lifted when Mum shows her a video on her tablet sent by Dad and Bluey. In a ramshackle film shoot of friends, relatives and neighbours, Bluey spins the tale of a young girl on a quest to help heal her poor sick puppy named Bumpy. Her journey leads her across the lands to a wise old wolfhound (played by Aunt Trixie) who opens her eyes to a simple truth - everyone gets sick sometimes and it’s just a part of life. As Bumpy is healed with time and love, everyone takes a bow for a delighted Bingo.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Dad is the king of trampoline games and the girls can’t get enough. But when it’s time for Dad to go to work, Bluey and Bingo can’t bear to see him go. Insisting he can’t leave without a proper meal, they make him play the breakfast game - bounce-cooking Bingo and Bluey as toast, eggs and even a disgusting smoothie. But all good things must end, and as an emotional Bluey says goodbye, Dad charges her with a job of her own; making up her own new games. She accepts the challenge and with the help of a garden sprinkler transforms the trampoline into a salad spinner for a delighted Bingo and Mum.

programme.title: Sofia The First
programme.desc: When Clio helps Sofia practice for the upcoming school musical auditions, Sofia sees that Clio is a talented singer and dancer in her own right and convinces her to audition too.

programme.title: Sofia The First
programme.desc: Lord of the Rink: Prince Hugo is hesitant to try a sport he thinks is just for girls but Princess Sofia teaches him that Enchanted Ice Dancing is for everyone.

programme.title: The Lion Guard
programme.desc: In order to access a new watering hole, Kiara and the Guard must appeal to Dhababu, a haughty zebra leader in the Backlands.

programme.title: The Lion Guard
programme.desc: Beshte makes friends with a little gecko named Hodari who wants to be a crocodile more than anything else in the world!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Mum bans the girls from saying the word dunny because its not a word the Queen of England would use, but the kids try and trick her into saying it anyway.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey wants to help Dad make Bingos birthday cake, but first she must put away her toys. But nothing can tempt her to clean up, until Dad drops the cake.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: At a party, Bingo is desperate to show off her handstand skills, while Nanna cant find a way to make herself useful. Theyre both feeling a bit lost, until they find each other.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey and her friends turn a tree stump into a thrilling game of Helicopter. But as the pilot, Bluey has to learn to give up some control, so they can all have fun.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When Chloe tries to teach her dad to improvise and play Blueys game of Octopus at home, he finds it hard to understand, until they realise they can play it their own way.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Mum reminisces about Bluey and Judo as babies. Bluey learnt to roll over first, but Judo was the first to crawl, so then it became a race to see who was going to walk first!

programme.title: Botched
programme.desc: Dr Terry Dubrow comes face to face with the largest breasts he has ever seen. Dee grew up flat-chested, so as soon as she is able to do something about it, she does. But she goes way too far, as she realises in her work as a dancer that the more amply endowed girls get the bigger tips. Each time she got a new boob job, another girl turned up with yet bigger breasts. Dees breasts tripled in size from her first boob job, but she still wasnt satisfied. With magazine shoots now coming in, she went bigger and bigger, eventually ending up with three litres worth of volume in each breast. And then one of them deflated, leaving her other side to bear the weight, causing significant complications. Elsewhere, Terry and his partner Dr Paul Nassif meet a patient going to extraordinary lengths to literally look like Superman, including a trip to the Philippines for fat-burning chemicals that are banned in the US. Finally, the doctors are asked to fix a soldiers nose that has been broken a dozen times.

programme.desc: Terry and Paul meet Melissa, an exotic dancer, who is unhappy about her breasts. The famed surgeons then meet Pam, a woman who needed to have her nose rebuilt after a swimming pool accident when she was young. Unfortunately, her previous operations werent a success so Paul and Terry step in to give her a chance to breathe properly again.

programme.title: Slam

programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: La verite sort de la bouche des enfants
programme.desc: Candice Renoir enquete sur lagression de Mathieu Vivien, un entraîneur de rugby. Elle decouvre que Mathieu cache un secret : il est papa dune petite fille et partage sa vie avec un homme. Lenquetrice doit par ailleurs gerer la rentree scolaire de ses enfants.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Le corps dun jeune homme est retrouve immerge au milieu des parcs à huîtres. Ce garçon sans histoires suivait un cursus universitaire à Montpellier. Candice pense dabord à un possible trafic dhuîtres pour financer ses etudes. Mais elle va vite faire la connaissance de Francesca, une femme dune soixantaine dannees qui lui louait une de ses chambres...

programme.title: La France en Vrai
programme.desc: Cette collection documentaire traite les grands sujets de societe dun point de vue local, à travers les 13 antennes regionales du reseau de France 3. Ainsi, chaque sujet est-il raconte de plusieurs points de vue complementaires. De quoi decouvrir une France plurielle et riche, qui sinterroge et qui soppose, au coeur des territoires. De quoi, egalement, permettre aux acteurs de la vie locale de faire entendre leur voix, grâce à 13 films ancres dans chacune des 13 regions, soit 250 films chaque annee.

programme.title: Le grand concours des regions
programme.sub-title: La meilleure danse folklorique de France
programme.desc: Chaque region de France a dans son patrimoine sa danse folklorique ou sa chorale folklorique. Les troupes locales amateurs entrent en competition pour tenter detre designees "Danse folklorique de lannee" ou "Chorale folklorique de lannee". Pour cette edition, le lieu de tournage est le mythique Royal Palace Music Hall de Kirwiller, en Alsace : une region connue pour sa richesse culturelle. En revanche, le principe artistique est reste inchange depuis la première edition du Grand concours des regions.

programme.title: Quand la tele derape, 40 ans de scandales
programme.desc: Christophe Dechavanne raconte la television provocatrice, scandaleuse et irreverencieuse des annees 1980, 1990 et 2000, quil a vecue de linterieur. Des emissions politiques aux talk-shows, des divertissements aux JT, aucun genre na echappe à son derapages parfois provoques, souvent imprevus.

programme.title: Journal Meteo climat

programme.title: La comtesse aux pieds nus
programme.desc: La sublime Ava Gardner donne vie à Maria Vargas, bergère tuee par son prince charmant, dans un film de Joseph L. Mankiewicz.

programme.sub-title: Fondant au chocolat aux epices douces, crème caramel coco-vanille
programme.desc: Meidhy Galas sublime le fondant chocolat avec un melange depices douces et une crème caramel coco-vanille. Brice Laurent Dubois reçoit Thierry Lauzea, artisan chocolatier martiniquais, et le chef reunionnais Amalia Irsapoulle.

programme.title: Chef pays
programme.sub-title: Tataki de thon au gingembre et au curcuma
programme.desc: Le chef Meidhy Galas et Brice Laurent Dubois revisitent le tataki de thon avec du gingembre et du curcuma. Sur le plateau, ils reçoivent le chef polynesien Tereva Galopin.

programme.title: Anatole Latuile
programme.desc: Les parents dAnatole ont une bonne nouvelle. Ils vont lemmener au parc dattraction "Startruc". Souci pour Anatole : son bulletin va arriver et il nest pas bon.

programme.title: Anatole Latuile
programme.desc: Limagination dAnatole, sans limites, lui permet de se tirer de situations delicates.

programme.title: Anatole Latuile
programme.desc: Anatole ouvre son cadeau danniversaire en avance, mais perd son contenu.

programme.title: Anatole Latuile
programme.desc: Limagination dAnatole, sans limites, lui permet de se tirer de situations delicates.

programme.title: Anatole Latuile
programme.desc: Anatole ne veut pas se faire couper les cheveux chez la maman de Naomie à cause de lhistoire de Samson. Il cherche des idees pour eviter les ciseaux.

programme.title: Anatole Latuile
programme.desc: Naomie est certaine que son poisson rouge peut predire lavenir. Zak pense quil peut utiliser lanimal pour savoir quand aura lieu le prochain test.

programme.title: Star Trek: Prodigy
programme.desc: La copie de Drednok communique un message du Devin : si les adolescents acceptent de lui rendre le Protostar, tous les prisonniers de Tars Lamora seront liberes. Après de longues hesitations, ceux-ci acceptent, non sans avoir dabord elabore un plan pour berner le Devin. Lorsque celui-ci entre en possession du Protostar, il realise que la proto-etoile qui alimente son moteur a disparu...

programme.title: Star Trek: Prodigy
programme.desc: Lequipage detruit Drednok et retablit le courant dans le Protostar. Le Devin fait detonnantes revelations à Gwyn. Il vient du futur pour empecher une guerre civile, provoquee par le premier contact avec Startfleet, qui aneantira leur peuple. Dans ce but, il veut detruire Starfleet en introduisant un virus informatique dans lordinateur de bord du Protostar...

programme.title: Wakfu
programme.desc: Amalia, Yugo, Elely et le faux Ruel parviennent à letage Sadida, où ils sont accueillis par la poupee Dathura. Pendant ce temps, Arpagone tente de convaincre le vrai Ruel de sallier à elle. De leur côte, Evangelyne et Flopin reussissent à sevader...

programme.title: Wakfu
programme.desc: Evangelyne accouche dun bebe qui a les pouvoirs dun demi-dieu. Par la seule force de son esprit, le nouveau-ne provoque des fissures impressionnantes dans la tour. Oropo utile son pouvoir pour empecher leffondrement complet du bâtiment...

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: C’est Pâques ! Les jeunes Titans sont prets à partir à la chasse aux œufs avec le nouvel appareil de Cyborg qui detecte automatiquement les œufs grâce à une technologie satellitaire. Mais lorsque l’appareil tombe en panne, les Titans decident d’aller dans l’espace pour analyser la situation et reparer leur precieux outil. C’est là qu’ils tombent sur le lapin de Pâques qui veut transformer la lune en œuf de Pâques pour que ce soit tous les jours sa fete preferee…

programme.title: Fashion Junior

programme.title: Bones

programme.title: Bones
programme.sub-title: The Memories in the Shallow Grave
programme.desc: Brennan and Booth adjust to their new life as an expectant couple, and deal with forthcoming changes in their in their home life. Meanwhile, when the Jeffersonian team identifies a womans remains found in a paintball field, they discover two missing persons reports in her file. Booth and Sweets interrogate the victims husband, and learn that she suffered from amnesia. When Squint Wendell Bray learns that the victim also survived a bullet wound, inconsistencies in her medical records uncover a surprising crime linked to her murder.

programme.title: Tales of the Walking Dead

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: After Jimmy The Butcher Figgis sees Jake and Holts viral video, the two begin plotting their attack. However, when caught red-handed, they are forced to experience the other side of the interrogation table.

programme.desc: Michael tries to figure out how to respond to Stanleys insubordination during a meeting, and Dwight buys Andys vehicle and immediately flips it for more money.
